Cytix Logo
Cytix
1-10
2022
Cytix is the first truly continuous security testing platform, focused on identifying change and using it to intelligently determine when to test. Whether it’s a developer making a pull request, threat intelligence about a new vulnerability, or a new server being deployed, we take feeds of data from across your technology stack and use this as telemetry to determine what has changed and what actions need to be taken to assess the impact that this has had on security. Simply connect us to your existing workflows through our list of pre-built integrations or leverage the suite of native tools within our platform. We bridge the gap between automation and manual testing by identifying what actions are needed at any time and carrying them out as a sequence of tasks. Through this, we are able to minimise the time between vulnerabilities being introduced and being identified, and provide the information you need in order to resolve them as efficiently as possible. We support applications, APIs, cloud-native services, and traditional infrastructure, providing you with a centralised platform from which to build a continuous security testing programme. We are CREST-accredited and our product can either be used to drive an internal security testing programme, or as a fully managed service. N-SMART Logo
N-SMART
1-10
Jan 2022
N-Smart simplifies the adoption of IoT, making the nation's grids reliable and resilient. Currently, many utility companies rely on a manual approach to restore services after a major outage, which can be inefficient and time-consuming. This involves assessing damage to poles and assets, mobilizing the right resources, and ensuring the availability of materials. However, N-Smart allows energy transmission and distribution companies to expedite restoring energy services using IoT. With N-Smart, utility companies can remotely monitor the condition of utility poles during a storm, monitor the availability and compliance of tools in service trucks, and automate supply management to ensure the availability of necessary materials for restoration. The platform connects multiple sensor data to a central system through the right connectivity in a unified dashboard. N-Smart's innovative system empowers companies to make informed decisions and streamline the restoration process. Additionally, with AI-enabled applications, N-Smart can automate regular processes, predict scenarios, and simulate smart behavior. This ensures utility companies can restore power quickly and efficiently, avoiding significant delays and minimizing disruption and inconvenience to customers and businesses.
Electrical Distribution, Internet of Things, Power Grid
Sterling, Virginia, United States
N-Smart accelerates power outage response and service recovery using Internet of Things (IoT) technology.

Skoog
1-10
2022
Skoog supplies high-quality forest and agroforestry-based carbon credits using satellite images, terrestrial and airborne LiDAR, and computer vision algorithms, combined with a simplified user journey that gives landowners of all sizes access to carbon markets. Skoog will automate and digitize the entire process of identifying properties, estimating carbon credit potential, assessing risk, certifying, creating contracts, monitoring, and managing payment to landowners. The credits are offered to companies looking to offset emissions as part of their net-zero strategy and incentivize systemic change towards sustainable land use. Skoog’s mission is to conserve and restore forests and improve agricultural practices through agroforestry. We have the vision to enable the standing forest economy.

BuffCut is a holding company that holds investment subsidiaries. This means that BuffCut owns and manages a portfolio of companies, but does not directly operate any of them. The subsidiaries are typically independent businesses, but BuffCut provides them with strategic guidance and resources. BuffCut's investment strategy is focused on identifying and investing in high-growth companies with strong management teams. The company has a proven track record of success, having generated significant returns for its investors over the past decade. BuffCut is a well-respected company in the investment community, and its subsidiaries are highly regarded by their customers and employees. The company is committed to creating value for its investors and helping its subsidiaries to achieve their full potential. The company has a proven track record of success, having generated significant returns for its investors over the past decade. BuffCut's subsidiaries are independent businesses that operate in a variety of industries, including technology, healthcare, and consumer goods. Eventual is a data platform that helps data scientists and engineers build data applications across ETL, analytics and ML/AI. Eventual is the developer behind Daft, an open-sourced query engine that runs on 800k CPU cores daily. Which is more compute than Frontier, the world's largest supercomputer! Today's data tooling (Spark, Presto, Snowflake) was built for a world of tabular data analytics, but does not generalize to the needs of modern ML/AI such as multimodal data, heterogenous compute and user-defined Python algorithms. Luca Logo
Luca
1-10
2022
Pricing Strategy is one of the most powerful levers that retailers have at their disposal to create growth, yet it is underleveraged. Most retail pricing teams settle for making decisions in spreadsheets, shooting in the dark, and working backward from a cost-plus margin target, leaving a LOT of money on the table. Our founders experienced these problems at scale when they built pricing tech at Uber that made Uber a billion dollars in profit a year. They realized that retail was lacking the same quality and sophistication of price tooling. So, they built Luca. Luca is an AI-powered co-pilot for retail operators, which constantly identifies revenue and profit headroom, makes recommendations for price adjustments and saves countless work hours along the way. Luca is backed by Y Combinator, Menlo Ventures, and others.

Look AI Ventures Logo
Look AI Ventures
1-10
2022
Look AI Ventures (LAIV) is the first investment fund in the Czech Republic focusing exclusively on early-stage AI startups. Our goal is to nurture the AI startup ecosystem by investing in a new portfolio of promising early-stage AI startups. LAIV is built on the foundation of AI Startup Incubator (AISI), integrating AISI's diverse portfolio, network, AI expertise, resources, and proven unique methodology into its structure. We invest in pre-seed and seed startups addressing major markets with core AI-driven solutions. We are industry and geography-agnostic (but primarily focused on EU-based startups). We invest tickets of up to €250K with a possibility of follow-up investment of up to €1M. We do convertibles and priced rounds upon company fair market valuations. Our team of seasoned managers, entrepreneurs, and technology and AI experts tailors cooperation to the unique needs of every AI startup. We provide technical support & governance, assigning a tech and business resource to the founding team. Founded in 2022 in Prague, the LAIV fund is backed by AISI's demonstrated capabilities and network of AI & ML experts. Everything from the evaluation process to the partner ecosystem is built to identify and grow the most disruptive AI solutions and maximize the chances of generating superior, long-term investment returns.

Remynt Logo
Remynt
1-10
2022
Launched at the Founder Institute, Remynt empowers consumers to rebuild credit while resolving debt, enabling creditors to gain revenue from non-performing delinquencies. Remynt buys portfolios of charged-off consumer credit card debt and offers the opportunity to earn new credit, financial management tools, community, rewards, and a savings account while repaying debt to rebuild credit. The debt secures a credit charge card, which allows monthly payment reporting on an active credit account, helping consumers rebuild their credit scores more quickly. Leveraging AI, community, automated workflows, a customer-centric model, and a captive audience, Remynt empowers subprime consumers to grow their financial literacy and rehabilitate their credit. Employing best-in-class digital techniques to reach consumers, eschewing dreaded debt collection calls, and providing a tangible benefit to repayment, Remynt drives people online to resolve their debt.
Credit Cards, Debt Collections, FinTech
San Francisco, California, United States
Remynt is revolutionizing debt and credit recovery for credit challenged consumers.

We help companies build applications based on LLMs (and other Transformer models) and deploy them on private infrastructure. Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) You can build a RAG workflow by deploying off-the-shelf components and prototype a system that works for your case. We support many auxiliary features, including reverse tracing of output to documents, and ingestion for many file formats. Agents Enable the LLM to use tools by leveraging Agents. An Agent-powered system can decide which data it needs and search for it. Our implementation of Agents provides a simple hosting for execution layers and pre-build Agents for many use cases. UI Playground Connect all components without writing any code. Experiment with prompts, system commands, and custom LLMs by dropping them in a visual diagram. We support custom LLMs, vector storages, system commands, and soon embedding models, Agents, and auto- generated documentation. Other Transformers Build applications for voice recognition, translation and other tasks by leveraging specialized models. Containerise the Workflow When you have defined the workflow, evaluated it, and presented it to your stakeholders, you can get everything in one Docker container (inc. models), ready to run on your private server. We use powerful state-of-the-art compression pipelines to optimise models and make sure that your backend is cheap and fast.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Developer Platform, Developer Tools, Enterprise Software, Software
London, England, United Kingdom
We help companies build applications based on LLMs (and other Transformer models) and deploy them on private infrastructure.
201,288
—
bynedocs.com/
Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
—

2022
Xcharta is the world's first technology automating the extraction of data from graphs at scale. Built for analysts, researchers and data teams, xcharta scans documents and turns charts into numbers with a single click. It uses a powerful combination of AI and computer vision to detect plots and then extract data with high precision, meaning no user intervention is required to convert documents into numbers. Access xcharta either through a web-based 'drag and drop' interface (best for extracting from individual documents) or through its API (best for systematic, bulk extraction from large document repositories or for when you want to embed xcharta in a workflow).

Algrthm is a perceptual AI company. We believe the largest AI intelligence gap that exists today is the ability for agents to understand the physical world. Closing the gap requires that we expand the available set of training data to allow agents to better understand the physical world, not just the internet. We're working to more accurately understand the world by making new methods of perception available to AI, which means extending access to perceptual AI by creating sensor array toolkits and ML models for developers and partners. We’re mathematicians, scientists, physicists, and entrepreneurs with a deep understanding of AI and measuring the real world. We're a distributed team headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri.

TuneFlo stands as the premier ally for unlocking fresh revenue streams in the dynamic global music landscape, propelled by an AI-driven SaaS solution. This state-of-the-art technology empowers music entities to initiate the delivery of their catalog, lyrical compositions, artwork, and comprehensive marketing endeavors without relinquishing artist ownership to external parties. This ensures that labels and artists can channel their energy and resources more towards the heart of their craft: the music and its creators. With TuneFlo's innovative platform, music professionals globally can: - Seamlessly compose, organize, and distribute lyrics, efficiently manage their expansive catalog, and make their music accessible on a plethora of digital service platforms (DSPs) such as Spotify, Amazon Music, Apple Music, YouTube, Deezer, Tidal, Facebook, TikTok, and countless others. - Acquire analytics from total streams, plays and engagement on all social media platforms via API and monitor royalties and revenue. - Consolidate and oversee all royalty statements and revenue streams from their clientele within a singular, user-friendly platform. - Generate album artwork and maintain 100% rights to all compositions of lyrics, music, and artwork. TuneFlo, originally established as a music distributor, has expanded its expertise over the past decade. Our experienced team has a deep understanding of the music industry's complexities. We proudly offer independent music entities a specialized creation, delivery, and analytical platform solution, catering to their unique needs.

You might have to help at times too. It isn’t surprising if sometimes you feel like they’ve forgotten all about you. We all have ups and downs in life; you might be sadder sometimes or feel bad cause you don’t know what to do but not tell anyone because you don’t want to have them worried. The business provides clients with an all-in-one comprehensive suite of tools that help manage and provide guidance for every aspect of their business. Our clients are small businesses that require the assistance and guidance of a management consultant, but do not have the resources to retain a traditional consultant. Incbotix provides one affordable source for them to help manage, organize, and grow their business. The Company provides small business clients with an all-in-one productivity and business management web & mobile platform for all their needs. Incbotix is a cloud-based productivity and business management platform for small business. Incbotix eliminates silos and simplifies business management through a single, unified platform. This provides complete visibility over the client’s entire operation, including planning, clients, projects, resources, financials, and business intelligence, which allows them to better execute, elevate client satisfaction, improve financial performance, and more easily forecast revenue and resource needs. The components of this include Business Planning and Modeling, CRM, Online Marketing Management, Employee and Efficiency Management, Product and Service Management, Business Finance Management, Business Growth Management, and Website and App Management. Furthermore, the client can import their existing contacts, Products, Images, Invoices, Receipts, and more. Cinematronic Logo
Cinematronic
1-10
2022
Cinematronic is engaged in two ground-breaking product lines to significantly increase the viewer experience for audiovisual content via biometric user-reaction insights. Firstly, we are developing a patent-pending interactive, adaptive media system. A lot of content does not live up to users’ expectations, resulting in a loss of interest over time. Our system ensures a consistently high-quality user experience throughout the user’s media consumption. Besides making adaptable stories, the solution will become a fully automated quality assurance system. Using biosensors, the system detects the psychophysiological reaction of users and automatically adjusts the content based on their immediate needs. Moreover, we are working on Biometric Quality Assurance. Conventionally, media production companies invest a significant amount of time and money in creating high-quality productions. Yet, this is not always a warranty for success. Quality assurance is often not used within the creative production phase but rather at the end of production when most of the financial and creative resources have already been spent. Our quality assurance solution uses biosensors as part of the research design within the creative process, dramatically increasing the level of user insight provided – making it easier for producers to tailor the user experience to their target audience before finalizing the productions.

YTSummarizer
1-10
2022
YTSummarizer is a YouTube video summarizer tool utilizing AI technology. Users can quickly obtain summaries of YouTube videos by pasting the video link into the tool. The tool provides an option to select summary length, giving flexibility depending on the user's specific needs. The summaries produced are concise and relevant, capturing the main points of the videos. This feature is made possible by harnessing the power of AI to process and condense the video content immediately. Additionally, YTSummarizer stands out with its interactive AI chat feature. This capability allows users to pose questions to the video and receive instant responses, greatly aiding in understanding complex topics presented within the video. The tool integrates industry standard security measures, ensuring user data is protected and compliance with GDPR along with other privacy laws is maintained. Seerlinq Logo
Seerlinq
1-10
2022
Seerlinq specializes in the development of AI-based solutions for non-invasive diagnostics, disease monitoring, and treatment optimization. The company focuses on leveraging photoplethysmography (PPG), an optical measurement technique that detects changes in the peripheral vascular bed, to advance healthcare. By analyzing vast amounts of data, including patients' medical records and genetic information, Seerlinq's AI algorithms aim to identify patterns and predict outcomes for better disease management. This approach is particularly focused on improving the quality of life for patients with heart failure, by offering more precise and personalized treatment options. Seerlinq operates in the biotechnology industry and is committed to reinventing PPG analysis to elevate non-invasive medical practices.

Vectara is the Trusted Generative AI for Enterprise Applications, a Serverless Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) platform that simplifies RAG & ML pipeline for better generative outcomes in applications, chatbots, and products. Vectara's product is an end-to-end Serverless Retrieval Augmented Generation API platform for embedding powerful generative AI functionality into applications, chatbots, and products with extraordinary results that are grounded in, and never trained on, the data, documents, and knowledge that they have. Built on a solid hybrid-search core, Vectara delivers the shortest path to a correct answer-action through a safe, secure, and trusted entry point that allows businesses to quickly, safely, and affordably integrate best-in-class conversational AI and question-answering into their application with zero-shot precision. Vectara's serverless RAG platform solves critical problems required for enterprise adoption, namely: reduces hallucination, provides explainability, provenance, enforces access control, allows for real-time updatability of the knowledge, and mitigates intellectual property and bias concerns from large language models. Chalk Logo
Chalk
11-50
2022
Chalk is a data platform that powers machine learning and generative AI. Chalk's best-in-class developer experience enables data teams to declare features and their dependencies with idiomatic Python in online, streaming, and batch environments. Chalk compiles these definitions into parallel pipelines that run on a Rust-based engine. These pipelines use the same source code to serve temporally consistent training sets to data scientists and live feature values to models. This re-use ensures that feature values from online and offline contexts match and dramatically cuts development time. With Chalk, engineers, data scientists, and analysts can focus on their unique products while Chalk seamlessly handles data infrastructure.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data, Machine Learning, Productivity Tools, Software
San Francisco, California, United States
Chalk is a data platform that powers machine learning and generative AI.

Cyclops Security Logo
Cyclops Security
11-50
2022
SecOps teams play a crucial role in fortifying an organization's cybersecurity defenses, safeguarding valuable and sensitive assets. The rapid evolution of cyber threats forces SecOps teams to handle numerous alerts and findings, prioritize vulnerabilities, and understand their risk within their organization’s environment. However, when an average organization has about 70 different cybersecurity solutions, gathering data from all of them, correlating and analyzing it to answer different questions becomes a difficult, time consuming, and a frustrating task. Cyclops’s cutting-edge AI-powered cybersecurity mesh (CSMA) platform enables SecOps to answer any question, no matter how complex it is, within a few seconds. It enables security professionals to easily prioritize security risks and mitigate exposures. Cyclops implements a Mesh Architecture approach by implementing AI to consolidate security data from the organization's security and IT technology stack, normalizing, deduplicating and contextualizing it. It creates a single unified source of truth for SecOps. By leveraging LLM, it enables security professionals to submit any question, in free text, and get instant answers that allow them to dig further for more information. If users aren’t sure about questions they should ask, CyclopsIQ suggests relevant queries based on the user’s role, current insights and past activities. Cyclops’s dashboards provide a high level view of the current security posture helping executives plan further.
Cyber Security, Security
Tel Aviv, Tel Aviv, Israel
Unlocking the Power of Integrated Data and AI in cyber security risk management.

Fabrica AI Logo
Fabrica AI
11-50
2022
Fabrica AI is creating a future where ideating and developing a robot for any task takes days, not years. We believe that by training end to end controls in simulation with reinforcement learning and above that iterating hardware designs, we can automate the whole development process. At the current stage, the most important resource is a large fleet of robots to validate our approaches for our AI system and to collect data. This would help keep us grounded in reality. To start building up the fleet, we invented an automatic tile grouting robot that boosts productivity by 5x and are piloting it on construction sites in Singapore managed by Woh Hup, BHCC, Gin Chia, Soilbuild, and Dragages. We have early leads in the US and Europe as well. Tile grouting is the process of filling up the gaps between tiles after the tiles have been laid. Grouting is part of virtually every construction project and a highly laborious process, is considered one of the most physically damaging tasks resulting in tilers’ knees and back issues, and thus quality issues would also arise. We invented a patent pending robot that is able to automatically grout and clean tile gaps with only a press of a button. The operators would only need to reload grout and water. We are headquartered in Delaware, and have offices in Singapore and Brno, Czech Republic. Demo locations include Zurich, Miami, London/Cambridge, and Vienna.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Construction, Robotics
Singapore, Central Region, Singapore
Fabrica AI is creating a future where ideating and developing a robot for any task takes days, not years.
34,233

UMMA LIFE Logo
UMMA LIFE
11-50
2022
A decentralized social network for Muslims leveraging token economy for enhanced community experience Highlights: A Sharia-compliant social network designed for Muslims and people of traditional views Umma Life includes various built-in products and features such as Umma Marketplace, Umma Education, Umma.Nikah (marriage agency) and more UMMA Token, a cryptocurrency that supports the Umma Life ecosystem. It can be earned for active actions and used for various purposes such as promoting content, advertising, and more Introduction: Umma Life is an Islamic social network that connects Muslims from around the world. It is designed to be a comprehensive online community based on the principles of Islamic law, with a variety of features including news, information, a mosque directory, a marketplace for Islamic goods and services, and more. The social network is moderated to ensure that all content aligns with Islamic values. Problem Statement: Conventional social networks, dating services, and digital currencies often promote and allow the sharing of content and values that are in direct conflict with Islamic principles and beliefs. For example, many of these platforms encourage extramarital relationships, which is strictly forbidden in Islam. Furthermore, conventional social networks may not have proper mechanisms in place to filter out or restrict access to content that is deemed offensive or inappropriate according to Islamic teachings. This can lead to Muslims being exposed to harmful or inappropriate material, further compounding the issue. Given these challenges, it is important for Muslims to seek out alternative platforms that align with their beliefs and values. These platforms should prioritize the protection and promotion of Islamic principles, while also offering features and services that are in line with the teachings of Islam. Solution: Umma Life provides a safe and secure platform that is based on Sharia principles and prohibits content that contradicts Islamic values.This platform serves as the foundation of the UmmaLife ecosystem, and allows users to connect, share, and engage with each other. It includes a social network, a marketplace, education platform, marriage agency and a cryptocurrency, UMMA Token, which helps to create a self-sufficient ecosystem within the social network. The solution consists of several key components that work together within the UmmaLife ecosystem: Umma Marketplace marketplace is designed to support the halal economy and promote entrepreneurship within the Muslim community Umma Education provides users with the opportunity to organize and participate in online learning Umma.Nikah is designed to promote the idea of a halal and moral relationship and is based on Sharia principles. UMMA Token: UMMA Token is an important component of the Umma Life ecosystem and can be used for a variety of purposes, including promoting content, purchasing goods and services in the marketplace, investing in the platform, and more. Tokens can also be earned through active engagement on the social network, such as creating and uploading content, commenting, and reporting prohibited content. Token Utility: The UMMA Token is designed to support and stimulate the growth of the Umma Life ecosystem. It can be used for: Premium account and verification Upcoming: Promoting stories, videos, podcasts, and other content. Targeted advertising Purchasing goods and services in the marketplace. Supporting and promoting a user's profile in the marriage agency. Remittance and transferring currency within the social network. Voting for user publications through donations of tokens. Earning tokens through active engagement on the social network.
Advertising, Finance, Information Technology, Marketing, Software, Web Development
Doha, Ad Dawhah, Qatar
Social network, web3, AI, social media, blockchain, token

admarket.co Logo
admarket.co
11-50
2022
Admarket is a trailblazing AdTech startup that's reshaping the advertising landscape. By offering a streamlined and secure platform for reserving, purchasing, and selling ad spaces, it connects advertisers and media owners like never before. With just one click, advertisers can book various types of ad spaces - including TV, radio, digital screen, outdoor, in-store, and in-flight - from anywhere in the world. Admarket simplifies the process of securing ad spaces from preferred media owners and agencies, while its payment service provider, Stripe, ensures top-notch security for customer credit card information. Media owners benefit by gaining access to a global customer base and boosting their revenue. Designed for ease of use, Admarket allows advertisers to view ad spaces on a map, similar to hotel booking sites. Its innovative AdsChange feature enables media owners to swap ad spaces with one another, like exchanging billboard space for radio ads. Plus, advertisers can swiftly broadcast urgent announcements via TV or radio. Looking ahead, Admarket aims to leverage AI technology for identifying sector-specific advertising needs, planning, and design. It will also incorporate automatic bid strategies for outdoor media, TV, and radio ad spaces. Advertisers will be able to view cost-effective advertising options on various timeframes through chart data, akin to flight ticket pricing. Moreover, the AdBroker feature will enable media owners to earn additional income through Admarket's profit-sharing program. In a nutshell, Admarket is a groundbreaking AdTech startup that's revolutionizing the advertising industry by streamlining ad space booking for advertisers and expanding the customer base for media owners. With plans to introduce even more cutting-edge features, Admarket will continue to drive innovation for both advertisers and media owners.

XRAI Glass Logo
XRAI Glass
11-50
2022
XRAI Glass develops software that transforms audio into visual subtitles in real-time, designed for use with smart glasses. This technology aims to enhance human connection by making conversations more accessible, especially for those with hearing impairments. By converting speech into text and displaying it on augmented reality (AR) glasses, XRAI Glass allows users to follow along with live conversations as if they were reading subtitles on a screen. The company's app is compatible with iOS and supports various AR glasses, including XREAL Air and TCL NXTWEAR S, with options for custom prescription lenses. XRAI Glass focuses on creating solutions that empower individuals to fully participate in verbal communications, making everyday interactions more inclusive.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, Mobile Apps

Shamiri Health is a Hypergrowth HealthTech Startup making mental healthcare affordable and accessible in Sub - Saharan Africa and the global markets. Founded in Harvard University and launched in Kenya, Shamiri Health is the fruit of over four years of research and $3 million in development funding through our non-profit arm Shamiri Institute. Shamiri Health is on a mission to make psychotherapy affordable and accessible in underserved regions of the world, starting with Africa. We enable users to access a wide range of caregiving options ranging from effective low-touch therapy to one-on-one therapy through a tiered caregiving model where users are matched to lay-providers, social workers, and therapists depending on clinical need. Care is provided on our community-oriented platform called Rafi where users turn their lived experiences into shareable art and connect with new friends and a community that understands them.

spoon.tech is an AI-powered restaurant SaaS for process simplification and employee growth. spoon.tech provides restaurant operators with AI-powered intuitive tools to (finally) systemize processes in their restaurants and enable employee learning. spoon.tech functionality in the essence consists of two parts: • Web-based application for restaurant managers and owners • Mobile application for restaurant employees (learning process like DuoLingo) Web-based application Using the web-based application, a manager can visually define all the processes in their restaurant and gamify those processes, so that employees can learn them. This significantly shortens onboarding time and increases the quality of work in the team (everyone is on the same page in terms of how things have to be done). Specifically, the web-based application provides the following functionality: • Define processes in your restaurant operation in a clear visual way. The application allows for four types of processes: 1) menu (define the process of assembling dishes and drinks) 2) operations (define any operation-related process) 3) decisions (define decisions triggered by the external events) 4) guidance (define policies and rules) • Transfer the processes from text format to visuals with the help of AI (upload text, get visuals as an output) • Choose games for the defined processes (the application suggests the games automatically based on the type of processes) • Define roles in your restaurant and assign processes to roles • Define quizzes: choose processes to learn in each quiz, define the cadence of quizzes, assign quizzes to roles • Monitor employee progress: see employee success rate and ranking Mobile application Using the mobile application an employee can learn the processes defined for them by the management in an easy and fun way. Specifically, the mobile application for restaurant employees has the following functionality: • Choose a quiz to complete and play the games inside of the quiz, therefore learning the processes defined by the management • See your progress and compare it with the progress of other restaurant employees • See process changes implemented by management and learn new processes immediately after they are inputted by the management.
—
Vienna, Wien, Austria
spoon.tech is an AI-powered restaurant SaaS for process simplification and employee growth.

Key features of ClearCOGS include: -Accurate forecasting of individual menu item and ingredient demand, reducing waste and operational costs -Detailed reporting on what to prepare each day, such as how many briskets to prepare for lunch -Precise inventory management and ordering recommendations -Integration with leading POS systems like Toast to provide a holistic view of restaurant operations ClearCOGS synthesizes restaurant data from POS systems, back-of-house software, weather, events, and other sources to provide actionable answers to daily operational questions. As most of the underbanked 40+ million Mexicans live in small and medium-sized towns, Aviva builds a bridge to those living in remote communities with its physical onboarding kiosks. These nano-branches provide a documentless 3-minute video onboarding for everyone in need of liquidity. Novel AI-based technology, including natural language processing, allows Aviva to match customers’ spoken word to the fields of a comprehensive real-time credit application. Transforming speech to text and inferring emotions and personality from the visual layer of the application video gives Aviva an edge in scoring thin-file customers. Leveraging these novel risk models, Aviva aims to provide the lowest interest rates available to today’s underserved.
Computer Vision, FinTech, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Predictive Analytics
Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico
Mexico City-based fintech startup building an AI-powered digital bank with a laser focus on the needs of the underbanked in LatAm.

Hour25.ai is improving emotional resilience to social networks in real-time. People’s success (in work, family, and any life goal) is fundamentally affected by the increasing problem to focus. Our mission is to improve people’s ability to handle powerful social networks and other AI-based services (retail, news, etc.). Hour25.ai has developed and tested a unique mobile platform that increases focus by detecting for the user, in real-time, when his emotional state has driven him into the ‘hands’ of social networks. Then - help the employee boost attention using behavioral interventions targeted by these focus-negative feelings. For example, when they validate that they’re bored, we provide them with a psychological exercise (video, quiz, short reading, music, etc.) to shift their focus towards where their focus lane is. For example - the boredom quiz asks them questions that help them understand the core reasons they are bored, which pulls them out of the unwanted emotional situation. AS a B2B company - we're targeted to provide a solution to many employers seeking to increase precious employees' productivity while ensuring they are happy. We use state of art natural language processing (NLP) techniques, machine learning and AI algorithms to process large-scale data to help our clients decide and prioritize programs, markets and investment decisions. The name of our company is inspired by the bird species - Canaries. Canaries have been extensively used in research to study neurogenesis, or the birth of new neurons in the adult brain, and also for basic research in order to understand how songbirds encode and produce song. Thus, canaries have served as model species for discovering how the vertebrate brain learns, consolidates memories, and recalls coordinated motor movements. This is a good analogy for Neural networks where backpropagation represents learning, final weights represent consolidated memories, and model inference represents recalling motor movements. We are proud to be an AI-first company. The name of our company is inspired by the bird species - Canaries. Canaries have been extensively used in research to study neurogenesis, or the birth of new neurons in the adult brain, and also for basic research in order to understand how songbirds encode and produce song. Thus, canaries have served as model species for discovering how the vertebrate brain learns, consolidates memories, and recalls coordinated motor movements. This is a good analogy for Neural networks where backpropagation represents learning, final weights represent consolidated memories, and model inference represents recalling motor movements. We are proud to be an AI-first company.

ScienceCast Logo
ScienceCast
1-10
Mar 22, 2022
The Business We are an AI aided research data management firm. We help researchers develop, disseminate, find and digest cutting edge research using AI tools and computer networks. On our website, and connected ecosystem, researchers can e-publish and collaborate, search and discover, and manage research data. We also help non-profit companies, Universities, for-profit publishing companies, Government agencies and Industry groups with enhancing their digital repositories of research data so that these repositories better serve their research customers. Target Market Our end users are researchers and authors looking for innovative software tools to develop, find and promote their research. We serve our customers either individually (BtoC) or through enterprises (BtoB) that serve researchers. The Business Opportunity The proliferation of research digital data has created a demand for AI software tools that enable a researcher to more easily find, evaluate, promote and collaborate on research data. Open and smart online access to research facilitates knowledge discovery and sharing. Our Competitive Advantage We are founded by researchers who understand and participate in the market we serve. Our founders are researchers in Academia and Government, and technical and computational experience informs the software tools we offer and the data we host. We understand what our customers need and how to develop and deliver it to them. Our Divisions We operate through three (3) divisions. First, we operate our SaaS website. Second, we develop and license our software tools to connected research repositories, who in turn make their content available to our customers. Finally, we provide science technology consulting services informed by research. Sales and Marketing Channels We are using online channels, email marketing and social media to recruit users and scale content. Our founders use their following to promote our business to their colleagues. Financial Summary We have begun earning revenues and operate a web portal which is scaling and has over 15,000 registered users since its launch almost 2 years ago. We are beginning to charge subscription fees for use of our AI tools. Our core addressable market (University based researchers) for academic publishing is $25 billion annually. This does not include the market for individual or non-University subscribers or the market for add on services, such as scientific recruiting and advertising. It also does not include the market for developing and selling software tools to data providers that service researchers. It also does not include the market for science technology consulting services. Our total addressable market is estimated at $50 billion annually. Funding We are currently seeking seed funding of $2.5 million to build internal resources for software development, sales and marketing and additional administration support.
Education, Information Technology, Online Forums
Towson, Maryland, United States
ScienceCast provides innovative software tools to make research easier.

Hometown Workforce Logo
Hometown Workforce
1-10
Mar 30, 2022
Imagine an A.I assistant that can find someone qualified to take care of your problem, get an estimated price for the service, and give you a few start times to choose from. Does this conversation sound familiar? I have this problem at ZIP code 39531. Can you fix it, when can you fix it and how much will it cost? Our A.I replies to that request with answers to each part. Example service request: “39531 toilet won’t flush” Example A.I assistant reply: Service Name: Toilet Repair (Won't Flush, Running, Clog) Estimated Price: $85 Soonest Arrival Window: 10/18 Thur, 9:00am-10:00am Click here to order this service Or find similar services here Hometown Workforce is like DoorDash for services with an A.I assistant that helps consumers hire service providers. These people create a series of service listings on our marketplace. Consumers then pick the service they need, choose an available start time, and deposit 1% of the estimated total down. This 1% contractually obligates the person to show up on time and complete the work for the price estimated. If they don't they risk losing access to the platform. This order process also runs the person's entire business. It manages payments, provides jobs, and schedules those jobs. All the person has to do is show up on time and do a good job. In exchange for this commitment to being honest and reliable, our tech can turn the skills of virtually anyone regardless of race, gender, background, or circumstances into a successful business. Angie's List and all the other lead gen sites do one thing. They connect consumers with contractors. They can't schedule the job. They can't verify the quality of work and they can't verify the price is fair. Without all 4 you can't effectively help consumers complete jobs. We take care of all 4 and more! MISSION STATEMENT: Our mission is to help eliminate poverty by turning people's skills into successful businesses. This is the first true solution to poverty I'm aware of. It's also perhaps the most powerful tool ever conceived for incentivizing people to be honest and reliable. HOW OUR TECHNOLOGY WORKS: What makes this platform truly revolutionary is the series of listings people create on our marketplace. These listings pre-price and pre-timed their individual services. Since each service is pre-priced we can standardize prices which eliminates price gouging, it also ensures the person gets paid. Since each service is pre-timed the consumer can look at the person's work calendar and see all the available openings with enough hours to accommodate the specific job. Then they pick one which ensures the person shows up on time. It also provides them with jobs and manages every hour of every day. It tells the person where to go, what to do, and when to be there. There are billions of ordinary people who have skills people will pay for. They just have no idea how to turn those skills into a successful business. That’s exactly what Hometown Workforce does! We also have a training division that can provide people with skills. You choose a trade, we partner you with an instructor who will create listings specific to your career path. Consumers order those services and after you learn to do the work on the job. All the listings are turned over to you and instantly you have a successful business. Order services today: www.wfskills.com

How does it work? Hireflow removes the time-consuming work of sourcing and emailing candidates by using AI to do it for you every day. Why? Successful hiring teams rely on outbound recruiting, but the process is time consuming and often does not get the attention it needs. By taking the most time consuming parts of the process out, Hireflow allows teams do more with less so they can hit hiring goals.
Human Resources, Machine Learning, Recruiting, Software
San Francisco, California, United States

At RiDERgy we play a crucial role to move the world towards a circular economy. We contribute to share and use vehicles and their batteries for efficient use of resources. This implies charging and discharging the vehicle batteries for optimal synergies with the electricity grid’s needs following renewable energy production fluctuations. RiDERgy intends to develop the best in class machine-learning algorithm to predict mobility and energy system patterns and steer millions of vehicle plugged in time in an optimal way. This more cost-effective solution will enable faster adoption of electric mobility. Our aim is to serve any type of vehicle from micro-mobility e-bikes and scooters to big trucks. We start by offering more efficient charging to E-Fleets. These drive much and see high electricity costs as a major pain point. We steer their charging at times when electricity prices are low and generate revenue by offering flexibility services to the electricity grid.

Shipfinex is a digital exchange revolutionising the Trillion Dollar Maritime economy. Shipfinex is tokenising maritime assets & simplifying investments, enabling Instant Payments & a Decentralised marketplace by using DeFi & web3 technologies. More than 80% of the world’s trade is seaborne carried by over 90000 ships. Shipping is the life blood of the global economy. Without shipping, intercontinental trade, the bulk transport of raw materials, and the import/export of affordable food and manufactured goods would simply not be possible. The approximate value of the worlds fleet is nearly a trillion dollars. Keeping ships on time needs a global infrastructure and support system that consists of suppliers, ship managers, crew, inspection agencies, Flag & Class societies, Banks, Port operators etc. This is a massive financial economy that Shipfinex intends to introduce efficiencies & unlock value for all stakeholders. Capitalising on the intersection of two massive markets of Shipping & Tech, ShipFinex is poised to create & capture massive value by creating new investment markets at the asset level & innovative global payment models. These measures will solve the issue of liquidity crunch in the maritime industry. It will also drive operational efficiency by reducing /eliminating friction in the services marketplace (lack of trust, slow payments, etc) Shipfinex's core proposition is enabling Sustainability and liquidity in the maritime sector by building trust across the globe between investors, businesses & stakeholders using Blockchain, Defi, AI & Web3 technologies.

Fieldmobi Logo
Fieldmobi
1-10
Mar 28, 2022
For decades, technology has been transforming the way businesses function, setting new benchmarks when it comes to efficiency and scalability. But while we can go on and on about what technology has done, one thing is for certain. It has left gaps. Small businesses and frontline workers (the 99%) have been left out of digital transformation plans for decades now. Today, they remain a major roadblock to creating truly digitized value chains. They are the parts of a large enterprise's workflow that remain manual and have no transparency whatsoever. Nothing is stopping small businesses and the working population from adopting technology if its value is clear and it's easy to use. It’s time for the next wave of digital transformation, one that extends the reach of technology from back offices of big businesses to the frontlines, and perhaps even to every connected partner, no matter how small. That’s what we are up to at Fieldmobi. We’re focused on enabling the next evolution of ERP by digitizing the 99% and connecting them to enterprise workflows, making truly and fully connected value chains a reality. To do this we have 3 product lines, all on the same platform, using the same app: Fieldmobi Frontline - A direct line to the teams, resources and operations at the frontlines of your business. It can be used in isolation or connected to an existing ERP system to extend it to the field. Fieldmobi First ERP - A stepping stone ERP system designed for undigitized businesses that have never used an ERP system. It uses Frontline to structure the master information required to set up an ERP system and comes with an AI-based ERP consultant to help with implementation. Fieldmobi ERP Extensions - Designed for large enterprises or industry partners, these are the truly verticalizable parts of our platform, allowing organizations to create a set of customized applications, connect it to its existing ERP system and roll it out to a network of vendors, partners and customers. We recently launched Fieldmobi Smart Notes on Product Hunt (We were the 5th Product of the Day and 10th of the Week!). Fieldmobi Smart Notes is a simple tool that any team can use. They just need to download the Fieldmobi app and create a team (just like a Whatsapp group) and the team can start sending in messages with images (that get converted to text), audio clips and Smart Tags for amounts, categories and keywords. It all gets auto-classified, geotagged, becomes searchable and can be viewed as a table, on a map or downloaded to excel as a report. (Imagine Whatsapp group chats disguised as a powerful field team management platform).
Apps, B2B, Collaboration, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Information Technology, Mobile, SaaS, Software

Prometeo's commitment to innovation not only strengthens client businesses by integrating seamlessly into existing processes but also boosts efficiency without the complexities typically associated with adopting new technologies. Mar 31, 2022
Hoursec is building for the first time in the semiconductor history, a Single Chip Inference and Training (SCIT) capable of continuous Inference and Training On-A-Chip, without dependencies to the Cloud. Hoursec is an innovative speed-up startup company with software/Hardware (and optionally new architecture) that reduces by up to 80% the amount of data needed for training learning algorithms, as a consequence, Hoursec is enabling doing both, training and inference on a same chip. As a first application for our breakthrough, Hoursec is creating an AI- assisted real-time processing of data transmission in parallel with inference processing. Continuous training, error-correction, and inference in real time. Consequently, Hoursec aim to reduce energy required for computation – lower power, faster simultaneous training and inference.

Xinnor Logo
Xinnor
11-50
May 2022
Xinnor develops xiRAID, a software RAID engine of exceptional performance. xiRAID is a product of a decade of math research, unique algorithms of data protection and in-depth knowledge of modern CPU operation. Although it works with all types of storage devices, xiRAID really shines when deployed together with NVMe® or NVMe-oF™ devices. xiRAID is the only software solution in the market capable of driving up to 97% of raw device performance in a computationally heavy RAID5 configuration, while maintaining a very modest load on the host CPU and low memory footprint. xiRAID is the best solution for your NVMe® infrastructure to speed up and secure all data storage workflow in such areas as: — AI Training and ML — Local NoSQL databases — 4K/8K video production and streaming — Packet capturing — HPC, and many others. Our product comes as a lightweight, state-of-the-art software package, downloaded and installed from our repository and ready to use out of the box, without a need to purchase any special hardware.

Agrobit Logo
Agrobit
1-10
Feb 14, 2022
Agrobit develops digital farming solutions based on imaging (smartphone, drones) to help farmers getting better decision in agro-inputs management. The flagship product is the mobile app iAgro, the first quantitative Decision Support System to optimize pesticide treatments and digitize crops (digital twin) quickly and easily just using a smartphone. The competitive advantages are to provide information unobtainable from other technologies (field sensors, satellites), the use of proprietary AR, AI and computer vision algorithms and the possibility to reach a huge number of users that cannot make high investments but are the majority in Europe (small/medium farms). The app uses AR to 3D-scan plants (tree crops) and in-cloud AI and computer vision algorithms to re-create the 3D model (digital twin) of the scanned plant, in order to calculate its biometrics (canopy thickness, height, volume), vigor parameter (LAI) and field parameters (LWA, TRV). Finally, a mathematical model estimates the correct pesticide doses to be distributed.
Agriculture, AgTech, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Computer Vision, SaaS, Software
Florence, Toscana, Italy
Agrobit has developed iAgro, a mobile app to help farmers taking better decisions in agro-inputs management using AI, AR and digital twin.

Our user-friendly process provides accurate size recommendations within five seconds, eliminating the need for additional apps or for customers to leave the retailer's website. One of the significant benefits we offer to fashion companies is a significant reduction in returns due to sizing errors. By providing precise sizing recommendations, we can increase customer satisfaction and decrease associated logistical costs. We also help fashion companies increase their conversion rates. Our technology gives visitors to your site access to personalized size suggestions based on their body measurements. This increased confidence in size selection leads to more completed purchases and lower cart abandonment rates. The accuracy and ease of use of our technology significantly improve the user experience. The size selection process becomes simple and engaging, which encourages customers to complete purchases and return in the future. As a result, it fosters customer loyalty and helps build strong, lasting relationships with your brand. Through our interactive dashboard, we provide invaluable data analysis, helping fashion companies optimize their stock management. By knowing your customers' body dimensions, you can ensure better product availability, reduce waste, and cut associated costs. We enable fashion companies to target their marketing more effectively. By informing your customers about the last sizes available based on their body measurements, you can optimize marketing expenditure and enhance the value of the shopping experience. Lastly, we are committed to supporting the fashion industry's sustainability efforts. Our solution helps reduce CO2 emissions associated with returns and minimizes waste. Mapilio Logo
Mapilio
11-50
Feb 1, 2022
Mapilio is an open-source mapping platform that allows users to crowdsource street-level imagery and data. The platform allows anyone with a smartphone, action camera, or other device that can take photos to capture images of the world around them, which can then be uploaded to Mapilio's platform. These images are then processed using computer vision algorithms to create 3D models of buildings, roads, and other objects in the environment. By utilizing user-generated images and data, Mapilio creates highly detailed and up-to-date maps that are constantly evolving. This makes the platform an ideal solution for a wide range of applications, including navigation, urban planning, logistics, and more. Mapilio's platform is also designed to be highly scalable, allowing it to be used in small-scale projects as well as large-scale ones. One of the key features of Mapilio's platform is its ability to enable collaborative mapping. Users can work together to create highly accurate maps by sharing images and data, which can be merged to create a complete picture of the environment. This collaborative approach allows users to quickly create detailed maps of areas that would be difficult or impossible to map using traditional methods. Mapilio also provides a range of tools and APIs that developers can use to build custom applications and integrate the platform into their existing workflows. This includes tools for data analysis, machine learning, and more, which can help businesses and organizations make better use of the data collected through the platform. Overall, Mapilio is a powerful mapping platform that is transforming the way we create and use maps. By leveraging the power of crowdsourcing and computer vision, the platform is able to create highly accurate and up-to-date maps that are essential for a wide range of applications.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Geospatial, GPS, Location Based Services, Machine Learning, Mapping Services, Navigation, Software
Andover, Hampshire, United Kingdom
Mapilio is the platform that makes street-level images and map data available to scale and automate mapping.

Hoplab is dedicated to improving performance and preventing and minimizing injury risks in professional sports by harnessing the power of artificial intelligence and data science. Our goal is to enhance athletes' health, well-being, and performance through innovative technological solutions. We are creating the future of the Sports Performance and Injury Analysis, we offer an electronic performance record of an athlete. HopLab has a product “APR”: APR stands for Athlete Performance Record and is an electronic record of an athlete. It involves a systematic collection of relevant athlete data at various stages of their sports journey. The APR includes information on an athlete's performance, training regimen, injury history, and other important metrics that help coaches and trainers optimize their performance.

This would allow users from these existing platforms easily make crypto transactions 3. Inchat-transactions - Beepo allows its users to make quick transactions directly from the dm without switching to the wallet section 4. E-commerce - Beepo also integrates a professional feature for small-scale business owners which allows them to create a sales catalog that they display and sell products easily. 5. Decentralized and Autonomous - Beepo is designed to be fully decentralized and fully autonomous therefore we're integrating AI and ML Algorithms into our system that'll handle Censorship and moderation thus protecting users from cyber bullies and also eliminating child pornography or any provoking content that may promote Terrorism, Rape, trafficking or whatsoever is deemed inhumane and illegal in order to keep the community safe. Beepo is trying to solve 1. Privacy issues around social media usage: The vast stockpiles of personal data that social media platforms gather and hold are susceptible to hacking, scraping, and data breaches, the at-risk data might include location information, health information, religious identification, sexual orientation, face recognition imaging, private communications, and personal photographs, among others. 2. Biased and Centralised Censorship: The regulatory ideas for social media and technology companies are motivated by political concerns. Since they are based on the choice of a private organization or government body and not that of the broader people, these restrictions on free expression are often seen to be prejudiced. 3. Complexity: Making crypto-based and cross-border transaction is very complex for people who are eventually new to the system and how it works, the need to use multiple crypto wallets to execute certain task and the complexity in handling certain crypto wallets increases the chances of making errors in transactions.

TerraVision Logo
TerraVision
1-10
Apr 6, 2022
REALTIME PREDICTIVE INSIGHTS FOR HEDGE FUNDS: Simple answers to high-value questions. Investors seek fundamental insights into the companies they invest in. They can gain a competitive advantage by licensing proprietary information that only a limited number of funds can find and afford. To build these high-value datasets, we strategically place cameras/sensors to collect images/data of business activities that map to key company performance insights. We can process that data with AI (Computer Vision/Machine Learning) to generate unique insights into high-value questions for Hedge Funds and other asset managers. Specifically, in our first two datasets we collect highly accurate and precise counts of every vehicle (Model Y or now Cybertruck) produced by Tesla at the GigaTexas factory and all four models (S, X, 3, and Y) vehicles produced at Fremont, CA. We license this data to hedge funds seeking an information advantage for trading equities. Investors call this type of information Alternative Data or External Data because it's not published or directly sanctioned by the companies we observe. It is often built through innovative technology from unconventional sources. As we scale up, we expect to have numerous high-valued locations. We are hiring in several areas, DM me directly.

Data-driven Insights: Beyond individual evaluations, our platform provides aggregated data-driven insights. This empowers startups with benchmarking data, allowing them to gauge their performance against industry standards and trends, providing a competitive edge. Tailored Recommendations: Gradar's AI doesn't just provide generic feedback—it tailors suggestions to the startup's unique characteristics, helping founders present their vision authentically while aligning with investor preferences. Empowering Investors: Our platform also benefits investors by offering a standardized framework for evaluating startups. It allows investors to focus on core business aspects while leveraging AI for preliminary evaluations. In essence, Gradar's platform is a transformative force in the fundraising arena. With our AI fundraising models and generative AI chatbot, we enable startups to craft compelling narratives, refine their pitches, and significantly enhance their chances of securing investment. Our commitment to equitable innovation drives us to continually redefine the boundaries of what's possible in fundraising.

—

Silentus Logo
Silentus
1-10
Jan 31, 2022
The global economy bears a price tag of more than $320 billion to afford the impact of burnout on high-skilled workers. This scenario comes as a result of professionals not being able to deal properly with both setting clear boundaries between personal time and work hours as well as having clarity on what (and how) they need to achieve in terms of business objectives, in addition to managing increasing notifications and distractions that come from the new ‘normal’ of remote work or hybrid workplaces, for instance, households tasks that add up to existing business responsibilities. All this results in an unhealthy work-life balance and lower personal productivity, including poor time-consistent behavior, like procrastination. From the whole group of professionals, there is one subset that presents the worst statistics. According to McKinsey, there is an estimated 165 million high-skilled freelancers and independent consultants on a part- or full-time basis, and research shows that each of them gets about 50 to 60 distractions per day on average, taking it approximately 23 minutes to regain focus every time. As a result of all these interruptions, these professionals lose around 500 hours of productive time per person per year; time that could be used to improve their work-life balance, or grow their businesses if they wanted to. In order to avoid this problem, digital workers currently use some well-known best practices recommended by productivity experts, like using phone’s ‘Do not disturb’ or airplane modes to manage their notifications, or to-do lists to keep track of their tasks and finish work on time; nevertheless, these tools don’t solve the core issue of decreased workers’ well-being nor manage to maximize their time and energy levels to create a better work-life balance. For instance, ‘Do not disturb’ mode silences mobile phones at the expense of missing relevant calls (i.e. from their most important client), whereas to-do lists only provide visibility on a set of tasks that need to be tackled or delivered within a certain timeframe; however, they fell short on providing clarity on whether these tasks are realistic and achievable, or what necessary steps are required in order to help users remain time consistent. Additionally, this problem becomes greater when we consider that these high-skilled professionals are solopreneurs who don’t have a team to rely on or to use as support to brainstorm how best to approach their challenges, adding a layer of ‘loneliness’ to their work routines. Based on the previously mentioned problematic scenario in combination with the feedback we have collected during our interviews with more than 300 high-skilled professionals, we decided to work on Silentus, a productivity app that helps high-skilled freelancers not only setup a focus mode that keeps them on top of their most relevant notifications (by creating allowed lists for both contacts and apps) but also beat procrastination (by providing them with a smart ML-enabled tool to get visibility on how to achieve their goals). Take the example of a freelance copywriter. On a given day she needs to deliver some articles for three different clients. Depending on her schedule, she can create three allowed lists with names of stakeholders for each of her clients and turn them on and off accordingly. Moreover, when she’s working on client A’s assignment (for instance, deliver a 50,000-word blog article), she can use Silentus’ ML tool to forecast her success rate on completing this task on-time and in-full. The way this smart tool works is as follows: our freelance copywriter enters few parameters like deadline, number of words, or client linked to this task. Based on her past activity, our tool forecasts her success rate. If this rate is below certain threshold, Silentus will recommend her different options to increase her success percentage; for example, extending the deadline, splitting the task into smaller chunks, etc. As a result of using Silentus, our freelancer benefits not only from gaining extra time by working on focus mode but also from getting clarity and time consistency when working towards clear and achievable goals, improving her work-life balance and well-being. Furthermore, she could use the time regained during her workday to grow her business (bill additional hours) or for leisure (more quality time with friends and family). Four aspects are part of Silentus’ competitive advantage. First, our AI/ML personal assistant that allows our users to keep their business running even when they are enjoying time off or logged off from work after ‘office’ hours. Second, sense of belonging to a Community of like-minded high-skilled professionals (who share their stories and tips on both our Slack channel and online community forums), contributing to fighting the loneliness of a profession like freelancing. Third, an extra week per month (equivalent to regain 500 hours per year) that workers can use for leisure or to create additional income (more hours to bill). Fourth, the ability to build upon new habits that will be instrumental to increase their personal productivity as well as their well-being.
Mobile Apps
Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, The Netherlands
Silentus helps high skilled workers improve personal productivity and wellbeing via a smart app to increase focus and beat procrastination.
1,192,530

Tilon Logo

1-10

Revheal is an innovative healthcare company that offers an all-in-one solution for the prevention and management of cardiovascular diseases (CVD). The platform leverages the power of digital biomarkers generated by wearable devices to provide continuous tracking of vital measurements, with a specialized focus on blood pressure estimation, eliminating the need for uncomfortable devices and manual recording of data. Revheal's solution also facilitates therapy adherence through reminders and recording of medicine administration events. With all of this data centralized in a single platform, Revheal provides automated analysis for therapy assessment and optimization, personalized for each patient. ROOKIE Logo
ROOKIE
1-10
Apr 1, 2022
ROOKIE revolutionizes the world of sports by seamlessly merging the physical experience of sports with the dynamic realm of digital rewards. Here's how: Integrated Sporting Goods: At the heart of our ecosystem lies our state-of-the-art sporting goods, like the ROOKIE Basketball. These aren't your run-of-the-mill equipment; each piece is embedded with advanced sensors that collect data as you play. Data Collection & Transfer: As users engage with our sporting goods, every movement, every score, and every skillful maneuver is captured. This data is then relayed to the ROOKIE mobile app in real-time. AI Analysis & Verification: Once the data reaches our cloud-hosted AI model, it undergoes a comprehensive analysis. The AI model identifies patterns, assesses the skill level, and verifies the authenticity of the gameplay. Tokenization & Rewards: Post-analysis, the authenticated data is directed to our distributed ledger. This ledger validates the transactions and, based on the player's performance, assigns rewards in the form of tokens. The better you play, the more you earn! Engaging Mobile UI: Players can track their performance, redeem their tokens, and even challenge others via the ROOKIE mobile app. It's not just about playing; it's about being part of a global community of sports enthusiasts. Multiple Play Modes: Whether you're an individual looking to practice (Free Play), wanting a head-to-head challenge (Quick Match), or teaming up for a group game (Teams), ROOKIE has a mode for you. Each mode offers unique rewards, ensuring players are continually engaged and motivated. Global Connectivity: With ROOKIE, geographical barriers are a thing of the past. Players from different corners of the world can connect, compete, and collaborate. Incentivization: Beyond the thrill of the game, players are incentivized for the time, energy, and passion they invest in sports. From skill points to PoS tokens, every achievement is recognized and rewarded. Community Building & Engagement: The ROOKIE ecosystem is more than just a product; it's a movement. From our podcast featuring NBA stars to strategic partnerships with industry leaders, we're fostering a global community bound by their love for sports. With ROOKIE, sports aren't just games; they're experiences, waiting to be lived and relished. Whether you're a newbie or a pro, with ROOKIE, every game counts!
Augmented Reality, Blockchain, Sporting Goods
Seattle, Washington, United States
ROOKIE makes sporting goods that allow you to compete with people worldwide, track your stats, and get paid to play.

Did you know that 6 out of 10 digital professionals are dissatisfied with their current position? This issue not only has an emotional impact on the professional, but it also costs companies up to 400% of the value of a monthly payroll due to low productivity and attrition. What if I told you there was an answer? Each individual has a distinct talent, and at each stage of their professional career, there is a job opportunity in which they can shine, and work happiness is essential to achieving it. We are Neomadas, the first HR Tech StartUp that improves work environments by connecting digital professionals with companies where they can shine through job happiness recruitment and selection. We developed a B2C2B business model to make this project scalable: Our ambition is to be the manager of Latam's largest digital rockstar community. To accomplish this, we focus not only on providing good support during the selection process, but also on being available to them throughout their working lives, providing them with tools for self-awareness, professional and personal development, and all from our platform. Digital interaction will provide us with enough information to identify talent in an unobtrusive manner, allowing us to bring you job opportunities at the right time throughout your professional life. Unlike other companies and platforms around the world, such as Talently, Torre, Multiplica, or Michael Page, Neómadas has online tests that are taken anonymously to the leader and the close environment of the vacancy, the results of which are crossed by our AI with the information of our community, allowing us to have a more accurate person-organization affinity. Likewise, we are the first to put job happiness at the center of the Recruitment and Selection process. We are a team of three founders: Marco Tito, a digital growth specialist with experience in StartUps such as Cabify; Sarah Cárdenas, a psychologist specialized in IT recruitment in StartUps such as Multiplica and Crehana; and Christian Revilla, a software specialist and entrepreneur of digital transformation agencies in Peru that have invoiced more than $ 1M (USD). Scorecards will be saved forever for users. They can invite others to take the quiz by sharing the quiz link. We have almost 90 percent of all popular movies and tv shows going back to the 1990s, and in the coming months, we will have everything that's ever released since the beginning of cinema. You can also request unavailable titles, and we will make them available in 2 weeks for now and very soon, within 24 hours or even instantly. The elevator pitch: We are a social platform that tests users' mastery of their favorite topics through AI-powered quizzes and spins out a cute scorecard that you can share on your social media. It will then create exclusive clubs of five people each from the top scorers, where they meet on a 35-minute zoom call and compete for cash prizes for sharing the most exciting stories or prompts related to the topic. Afterward, every participant rates the other four based on how much they enjoyed listening and interacting with them. Business Model: If 10,000 people took our quiz for Titanic and 1,000 participated via Zoom, we showed an ad before every quiz and zoom call. That's 11,000 ad views, so if we make a dollar from every ad view, it's $11,000. We distribute 80% of it equally to the top 10 finalists and keep the 20% to us. Mindgard Ltd specializes in providing comprehensive AI security solutions to enterprises. Our operations center around a sophisticated platform designed to determine, detect, and remediate adversarial attack vulnerabilities within AI models. The platform is built on over four years of PhD-led research in AI and cyber security, ensuring advanced protection that traditional Cyber Security platforms cannot offer. Our platform integrates seamlessly with existing AI and Cyber Security tools, enabling automated and repeatable vulnerability testing across the entire AI estate. This integration allows enterprises to efficiently assess and mitigate risks, optimizing their AI and cyber security resources. Key operational features include: - Automated Security Testing: Utilizing a library of adversarial attacks, our platform conducts thorough and repeated security tests to identify vulnerabilities. - Detection and Response: The platform continuously monitors AI models for threats and provides rapid detection and response capabilities to neutralize potential attacks. - Seamless Integration: Designed for compatibility with existing operational tools, our platform can be easily incorporated into current security infrastructures. Mindgard Ltd's operations ensure that businesses can securely adopt and innovate with AI technologies while protecting their digital assets, brand, and reputation in the evolving AI landscape.

Rosso Logo
Rosso
1-10
Jul 22, 2022
Rosso is a startup dedicated to eliminating the blood shortage crisis in Italy by serving as a connective tissue in the blood supply chain, collaborating with schools, universities, donor associations, and hospitals. Our primary goal is to reduce patient wait times by increasing the number of donors, particularly young donors. Currently, Generation Z is not donating blood significantly; the average donor age is 45, while donation is allowed from 18 to 65 years old. Through innovative social media campaigns and a booking platform, we raise awareness among young people, encouraging them to book donations at nearby centers and providing instant chat access with hematologists to address their concerns. For companies, we offer a welfare service and sustainability membership that engages employees in health prevention and blood donation. We organize awareness webinars, donation days, and monitor employee health, providing impact reports. These activities are included in the company's sustainability report and contribute to B-Corp certification. Our third pillar involves management software for hospitals. We offer a plugin that optimizes blood stock management in hospitals by managing donor portfolios and the relationships between donors, associations, and hospitals. By knowing the blood stock levels, we can send automatic recalls or alerts when blood is needed and there are donors nearby ready to donate. With the help of AI, we can predict future blood stock needs, required blood types, and the timing of potential shortages.
Health Care
Milano, Lombardia, Italy
Making Blood Donations Cool
