Leeloo LXP seamlessly integrates with existing LMS systems like Moodle to turn any learning content into immersive, personalized tutoring sessions in any language, that drive engagement, retention, and measurable results. With Leeloo's proprietary IVX technology (Interactive Video Experiences), learners engage in one-on-one video sessions with smart, responsive AI tutors. These tutors adapt to each learner's needs, providing lessons, explanations, examples, and assessments to ensure mastery of every concept. IVX sessions are automatically generated from your existing content, requiring zero modification. Our platform offers two industry-leading pedagogical approaches: Bloom's Taxonomy with 6 cognitive processes, and our own NIL-TO-IT framework which trains 12 cognitive muscles. Whichever you choose, Leeloo automatically creates all necessary assessments, saving you time and effort. Advanced analytics measure engagement, retention, academic results and hundreds of data points to deliver descriptive, predictive, diagnostic and prescriptive insights. Leeloo LXP provides real-time visibility into learner performance at every level of your organization. Track progress, identify skill gaps, and make data-driven decisions to optimize training investments. Leeloo LXP reduces costs for content production, translations, training time and infrastructure. Our skill acquisition guarantee ensures measurable ROI from every program. With Leeloo LXP, you can pinpoint areas where learners excel or struggle, adapt quickly to emerging skills gaps, and nurture high-potential talent. Boost employee motivation with personalized, interactive learning experiences that are proven to drive results. Our business model is designed for flexibility and scalability. Clients pay a one-time setup fee to integrate Leeloo LXP into their existing LMS and create customized web and mobile apps, and then choose between a pay-as-you-go per minute model or a per user per month subscription. This allows organizations to align costs with their specific needs and usage patterns.

Given that businesses are increasingly focused on offering AI-driven services such as LLMs, securing this new way of conducting business is equally important. Mindgard ensures that your business can safely and securely move into the new AI world and continue to protect your digital assets, brand and reputation. Our platform enables enterprise customers to determine, detect, and remediate against any adversarial attack vulnerabilities within all their AI models. This answers the “What is my AI risk?” and “How do I mitigate my AI risk?” questions that currently cannot be answered using traditional Cyber Security platforms. By designing our platform from the ground up to integrate with existing AI and Cyber Security operational tooling, Mindgard can be seamlessly added to your organization, providing repeatable and automated AI model vulnerability testing. The Mindgard platform has been in development for over 4 years based on cutting edge PhD-led, AI & cyber security research, also used by the global Intelligence Community. As well as providing a library of adversarial attacks based on deep research, leveraging our platform that can automate repeated security testing, detection, and response across the entire AI estate. By leveraging the Mindgard platform, our clients free up precious AI and cyber security resources and at the same time understand, detect, and mitigate risks across their entire AI model portfolio, which currently takes too long and is too expensive. The burden of paperwork consumes over 50-70% of a healthcare professional's time, meaning that for every minute spent with a patient, they must allocate at least another minute to paperwork. These tasks do not add value and ultimately lead to a reduced number of patients being seen. As a result, healthcare professionals may feel demotivated, and the decrease in patient volume can result in reduced income or the need to hire additional professionals. CoeurWay is a health technology startup that specializes in developing an AI-based software platform. Their platform seamlessly integrates with healthcare professionals' existing software and offers advanced analysis tools to optimize healthcare through technology. Specifically, here are their key features: Automated generation of standardized notes using AI, reducing administrative tasks for healthcare professionals. AI-assisted prefilling of mandatory forms, minimizing administrative burdens for professionals. AI-powered recommendations for healthy lifestyle habits and healthcare prescriptions, fostering a sustainable healthcare system. A centralized platform that consolidates various existing healthcare applications while incorporating AI capabilities into their software. Based on our clinical test results, we anticipate a significant reduction of 90% in paperwork through the use of this platform.

US Short Code Directory - Shortcodes.info Logo
US Short Code Directory - Shortcodes.info
1-10
Jun 10, 2022
The US short code directory site Shortcodes.info is a reverse text message lookup service that enables users to lookup unknown phone calls, text messages, and sms short codes messages from businesses. A short code is typically a five or six digit number that a business can use to send text messages to consumers. The website is an SMS aggregator, meaning that when users get phones calls or receive text messages from numbers they don't know, they can use our short code registry to see who it was. The reverse phone lookup search can be used by anyone for completely free. What makes Shortcodes.info so unique is that it is powered by AI and automatically shares what sending a text message containing the short code keyword "HELP" responds with for a given short code numbers.
Information Services

noc™ Logo
noc™
1-10
Jul 7, 2022
Knock Technology creates and operates SaaS products for remote work productivity. The company's first product is noc™ - a video communication tool, scientifically designed to minimise the cognitive effort of context-switching between tasks and calls. By minimising the cognitive load on the human brain, users are able to communicate more naturally whilst maintaining focus on their current task. This results in reduced mental exhaustion ("Zoom fatigue"), fewer incidences of miscommunication, improved productivity, innovation, and staff retention. The product also uses natural language processing (NLP) and artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms to summarise conversational content and deliver live, unbiased operational data to business leaders. After a call, the NLP transcript is compressed by the AI into a bullet-pointed summary of the conversation. For larger companies, the AI compresses all conversation data to present a live operational dashboard to senior leadership, helping them make more informed decisions. The company has been awarded grant funding by the EU's Regional Development Fund and Innovate UK's Transformative Technologies Fund for research into the effects of remote communication on mental health, productivity and innovation, as well as its contribution towards net zero carbon emissions by reducing the demand for travel. The product was created by thought-leading user experience designers, MBA graduates and PhD neuroscientists from Cranfield University, The University of Bristol and University College London to fill a gap in the remote comms market for instant, casual communication with distant colleagues. It uses a unique peer-to-peer network architecture that bypasses data centres for a faster, clearer and more energy-efficient connection.

Clarity Logo
Clarity
11-50
Jun 8, 2022
Clarity is a clinical-stage company pioneering a new category of non-pharmacological treatments for neurodegenerative diseases. We develop a neuromodulation device combining immersive technology, AI and biosensors to deliver gamma sensory stimulation. Gamma waves’ sensory stimulation has been shown to significantly slow down Alzheimer's progression, reducing neurodegeneration and cognitive decline. Clarity takes a platform approach by enabling the customization of sensory stimulation protocols based on patient data, improving experience, efficacy and scalability across a wide range of indications. The company was founded by neuroscientists from UC Berkeley, and Oxford along with execs from OURA and Philips, and is supported by leading institutions such as UCSF's Neuroscape.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Health Care, Medical, Neuroscience, Therapeutics
Paris, Ile-de-France, France
Clarity is a clinical-stage company developing mutlisensory stimulation treatments for neurodegenerative diseases.

Oatmeal Health Logo
Oatmeal Health
1-10
May 19, 2022
Mission Oatmeal Health's mission is Empowering Health Equity Through Cancer Screening and Early Detection for marginalized communities. Problem Statement 1 in 2 men and 1 in 3 women in our families will receive a cancer diagnosis during their lifetimes. Unfortunately, 50 percent of these diagnoses occur at a late stage, where survival is at its lowest. We are changing this. Who is Oatmeal: Oatmeal Health is an AI-enabled specialty cancer screening as a Service focused on providing early-detection, health equity, and care coordination services for Federally Qualified Health Centers (FQHCs) and Health Plans. We are fundamentally changing the lives of marginalized communities through early identification, preventative screening, and comprehensive high-touch value-based care services, starting with lung cancer, and then breast, colorectal, and other cancers in the future.

MobilityZ Health Logo
MobilityZ Health
1-10
Jul 8, 2022
MobilityZ Health is an advanced digital health SAAS platform designed to assist orthopedic specialists in screening, diagnosing, and monitoring patients with musculoskeletal (MSK) injuries. Our proprietary software offers clinical decision support. The global market for MSK injuries is valued at a staggering 381 billion dollars, with an annual incidence rate of 129 billion cases annually. Despite these numbers, fewer specialists are available to provide care, and the number of patients far exceeds their management capacity. The lack of a proper triage mechanism has led to an alarming rate of physician burnout. Furthermore, delay in access to care can cause permanent damage and, in the worst cases, disability. Our AIML models will potentially function as Software as a Medical Device (SAMD).
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Employee Benefits, Health Care, Health Insurance, Home Health Care, Machine Learning, SaaS

Zeeh Africa Logo
Zeeh Africa
11-50
Aug 22, 2022
Zeeh Africa is a financial technology startup that aims to drive financial inclusion across Africa. We do this by providing a secure and user-friendly platform that simplifies financial management and streamlines credit applications for individuals and businesses. Our platform connects users to trusted identities, consumer financial data, and credit scoring/analytics, all with a single secure ID. The problem we are solving is the lack of reliable infrastructure and data analytics that makes it difficult for financial services businesses to access user identities and financial data in real time. This makes customer onboarding slower, less efficient, and more expensive. It also makes it harder for consumers to manage their day-to-day finances and financial data, and for small and medium-sized enterprises in Nigeria to make informed decisions based on data rather than intuition. To solve this problem, we offer a pay-as-you-use business-to-business model where clients fund their wallets and pay per API call, with each API endpoint having a predefined fee. We also have a consumer freemium model, with a subscription base (in the pipeline) where clients can subscribe to a volume of API calls capped at a limit. The market we operate in is the financial technology industry in Africa, which is a rapidly growing market with a lot of potential. The size of the market is difficult to quantify, but we believe there is a significant demand for our product and services across Africa. Our opportunity for growth and scalability lies in our ability to continuously innovate and differentiate our products and services. This could include offering unique features or functionality, providing superior customer service, or offering competitive pricing. We also plan to expand beyond our current scope by exploring new industries and technologies that can benefit from our platform.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Database, FinTech
Lagos, Lagos, Nigeria
OpenBanking - CreditKarma for Africa

Leela Life is on a mission to help people across the world have a peaceful and joyful life A lot of people across the world, especially the top ones that are highly educated, skilled, creative, significantly accomplished, and demonstrate exceptional leadership and influence increasingly find themselves assessing their priorities in life & looking for a joyful, less conflict-ridden, and healthier life. Many of them have been exposed to Yoga, Meditation, and getting to know about Ayurveda, and have experienced the benefit of it. However, there is a whole world of practical Indic solutions that they are still unaware of. India’s ancient Knowledge has got deep & significant insights across a vast array of areas such as Health, Mindfulness, Food, Intimacy, Personal Care, Nature, Spirituality, Art, etc. meant to achieve a peaceful and joyful life. Given the vast range present in the Indic knowledge system and many different specialists (institutions/companies/individual experts/gurus) that espouse them, it's difficult for them to discover relevant solutions for their holistic wellbeing. Hence there is an increasing demand for, a knowledge-led curated marketplace that enables people across the world to discover, choose and integrate practical, relevant, and holistic Indic wellbeing solutions and apply them in their daily life. Leela Life’s Vision is to make Indic wellbeing knowledge the transformative difference in global health. Unlike modern healthcare that solves immediate health problems, Leela Life strives to achieve this vision by enhancing human capacity through personalized & holistic life routines that incorporate various products, practices & insights from Indic knowledge. Above techs would minimize the need for high manual labor costs as in legacy ecommerce platforms and we plan to pass on savings to customers. We started with a concept to help struggling small businesses and public companies during the pandemic, selling their products online with no fees. Eco friendly: We believe the growth of warehouses meant to promote immediate delivery around big cities are harmful to the environment, doubling the truck traffic on highways, carbon footprint of the warehouses and doubling the use of packaging material. Our model would be less harmful to environmental. Products: Currently we have 200,000 products, in most of the categories, rapidly growing to a goal of 10 mil by end of the year. Xinnor Logo
Xinnor
11-50
May 2022
Xinnor develops xiRAID, a software RAID engine of exceptional performance. xiRAID is a product of a decade of math research, unique algorithms of data protection and in-depth knowledge of modern CPU operation. Although it works with all types of storage devices, xiRAID really shines when deployed together with NVMe® or NVMe-oF™ devices. xiRAID is the only software solution in the market capable of driving up to 97% of raw device performance in a computationally heavy RAID5 configuration, while maintaining a very modest load on the host CPU and low memory footprint. xiRAID is the best solution for your NVMe® infrastructure to speed up and secure all data storage workflow in such areas as: — AI Training and ML — Local NoSQL databases — 4K/8K video production and streaming — Packet capturing — HPC, and many others. Our product comes as a lightweight, state-of-the-art software package, downloaded and installed from our repository and ready to use out of the box, without a need to purchase any special hardware.

Agama QFT Logo
Agama QFT
1-10
Aug 8, 2022
Agama QFT is changing the vision of healthcare technology to the modern age, altering the landscape through its sophisticated use of blockchain, AI, and microservices architecture. This innovation extends beyond traditional healthcare IT systems, offering a decentralized, scalable, and secure platform for managing health data and processes. The core of Agama QFT's breakthrough lies in its utilization of the Corda blockchain, selected for its privacy-centric design. This choice ensures secure, private transactions within a network connecting healthcare providers, insurers, and patients. Agama QFT's integration with global health data standards, such as HL7 FHIR, guarantees compatibility and data portability across various healthcare systems. A distinctive feature of Agama QFT is its dynamic approach to healthcare standards. It achieves seamless interoperability and efficient data exchange by adhering to HL7 FHIR standards, promoting a universal, integrated healthcare experience. This is further enhanced by a QR code-based system for instant access to healthcare records, simplifying patient and provider interactions. At the heart of Agama QFT's technological innovation is its microservices architecture. This design choice facilitates independent scaling, updating, and testing of system components, ensuring agility, resilience, and the capacity for rapid deployment of new features. The system's decentralized data handling, via IPFS and S3-compliant cold storage, optimizes data integrity, security, and accessibility. The ecosystem supports advanced analytics and AI integration, leveraging detailed health data for predictive modeling and personalized care. It introduces NFT-based healthcare event tokenization, enabling unique, verifiable identifiers for medical interactions. This feature not only enhances traceability but also fosters controlled data sharing and privacy. Agama QFT's automated claims processing, powered by smart contracts, streamlines insurance operations, reducing administrative costs and improving patient satisfaction. The platform's commitment to regulatory compliance, including HIPAA and GDPR, underscores its dedication to security and privacy. The user-friendly, mobile-first design ensures that both patients and professionals have effortless access to health information, fostering engagement and enhancing the healthcare experience. With its visionary approach, Agama QFT is set to redefine healthcare workflows, prioritizing data integrity, operational agility, and the seamless integration of technology into healthcare.

Seodity Logo
Seodity
1-10
Jun 10, 2022
In the first iteration we’ve focused on the analysis of the content and technical aspects. While entering one address our crawler precisely analyzes each webpage. The most significant elements that we check are as follows: the most frequent key words in the whole website and each webpage separately (whether they appear in the title, description, alt, url, h1-h6 attributes) the amount of the content (key words in the whole website, webpages, in relation to html, etc.) popularity of webpages in the social media (useful e.g. during research of the competition’s articles) SEO technical aspects (title, description, h1...h6 elements, alt) SSL certificates when it is valid and when it expires image optimization on-site link correctness verification On the basis of all elements we determine the original Seodity Rank, with the usage of which one can sort webpages. Plan for the future (works have already been initiated): backlinks automatic competition verification on the basis of the Google search results (analysis of each competitive webpage separately and drawing conclusions + prompts) white-label report adjusted to the Client’s audit

There are 44 million SMEs in Africa, and the vast majority lack stock management solutions, relying on pen and notebooks to control the stock of their products and register their sales. Tech options cater to mid and high end businesses and are very complex for SMEs use cases. This brings a lot of inefficiencies to these SMEs, and susceptibility to product loss and theft. We have 2 main products: Digital Manager at https://digital.jon-ai.com Digital Manager is a Small Business Management Software that can help small businesses manage their business and get important information such as profit and cash flow so they can keep operating and growing their businesses. It works by having the business owner give information on his fixed costs, his products, stock, price and costs, and registering ever sale. Most businesses in developing nations such as in Africa, a micro business that need this software to keep in business and we are doing our best to promote it and keep improving it. This Software uses AI to register sales, and to give actionable advice to business owners. Invoicing Software at https://apps.jon-ai.com Jon AI brings Apps, a set of Stock Management and Invoicing solutions catering to SMEs and starting at as low as $5 USD month. Our software runs both online and offline, and helps businesses know exactly what their stock for each of their products and product categories is. The stock is then linked to the invoicing. Our solution offers easy stock management for any kind of small business, from Bottle stores, convenience stores, grocery shops, car shops, car parts shops, clothing stores and more. Our business integrates well with existing hardware (thermal receipt printers), but we also want to procure ideal hardware and supply to SMEs at atractive prices, for instance: bluetooth thermal printers, label printers, and others. We will become the number one supplier of both the software and hardware for SMEs. We provide diverse services, including business consultation, in-person and online training programs, as well as events and conferences supporting our mission. In our commitment to transformative education, we proudly present the London Intercultural Academy (LIA), an innovative AI-integrated online educational platform. LIA redefines education by offering a personalized learning experience tailored to each individual's unique needs. Our cutting-edge AI technology empowers learners with access to 200+ courses, enabling them to expand their knowledge at their own pace and from any location worldwide. Medmio Logo
Medmio
1-10
Aug 2022
Medmio, Inc. is a healthcare IT company with a mission to reduce healthcare costs by making medical billing and practice management more efficient. Medmio offers a mobile app for medical practices with automated charge capture and AI-powered medical coding, voice dictation, mobile patient intake forms, secure patient communication and much more. Using a continuously updated Coding Rules Engine(TM), Medmio automatically suggests the optimal billing and diagnosis codes to maximize revenue, ensure no charges are missed and reduce the risk of an audit. The app can be tailored to any specialty, users can select procedures performed by checking off boxes on a simple, intuitive questionnaire. Based on the user's input, the optimal CPT codes and ICD-10 codes will automatically populate. The user has complete freedom to override or add billing and diagnosis codes manually, and save custom favorite groups of codes so they can be applied to patient encounters with one click. The app features a real-time worklist of patients, and any data entered into the app, from CPT codes and ICD-10 codes to clinical documentation and patient photos, can flow directly into the client's source electronic health record (EHR) or medical billing software via bidirectional HL7 interface. Experience the power of digital health today with Medmio! Please visit our website for a free trial or for more information: https://medmio.com/

What makes the Shopazhub innovation unique, is the fact that these tools are provided to the merchant, and also in a Marketplace setting so that they don't need to bother about driving traffic. traffic naturally troops to the platform, while the merchant is left to do one thing that really matters, which is providing shoppers with amazing deals that will make them always come back to their storefront anything they return to the Shopazhub marketplace. micropay Logo
micropay
1-10
Sep 4, 2022
[micropay](https://micropay.ai) specializes in creating pay-per-use and anonymous Generative AI products. It is solving the problem of users overpaying for Generative AI software subscriptions that they don’t fully use. Traditional payments under $1 are usually very costly, since credit card fees charge a minimum of $0.30 per transaction. With the Lightning Network, this fee becomes negligible and is the technology that is powering micropay. Users don’t pay with credit cards or with US dollars, but instead pay a Lightning Invoice, available to pay through Cashapp, [strike.me](http://strike.me) or by having your own Lightning Node.

With PLAI, learners receive tailored content, guidance, and support based on their individual needs, learning style, and progress. This level of personalization enhances engagement, knowledge retention, and overall learning outcomes. Our LMS is not just about delivering content, but also about providing a comprehensive learning management platform that enables organizations to manage their training and learning programs effectively. By leveraging AI technology, 4Learn's LMS streamlines the course creation process, saving time and resources. RENERGIA Logo
RENERGIA
1-10
Jul 4, 2022
Our app introduces a paradigm shift in the market by providing a tool that systematically analyzes household energy usage. Users will provide input data through a brief onboarding questionnaire, which will take no more than 2 minutes to complete and includes simple questions. By adopting probabilistic, statistical, and artificial intelligence methods corroborated with our extensive know-how in the energy field, Renergia provides a customized household energy balance for its users, precisely estimating (2-7% error) their monthly and annual energy costs and savings potential (both electricity and heating). This plan will highlight the aggregate energy efficiency potential, quantified in local currency, and describes each proposed measure, which may include appliance replacement with energy-efficient equipment, household thermal insulation, migration to LED lighting, implementing of smart sockets, and installing photovoltaic systems which at the end of the day gives you all the information you need to make the best decisions about your both consumption and the type and nature of the energy used. At the heart of our product lies the SolarSensei intelligent photovoltaic system designer, which utilizes information such as the household's usable area, yearly electricity consumption, and the city of residence to automatically determine (one click distance from the complete solution) a suitable PV solution for our users. We translate the concepts of energy efficiency and sustainability into tangible benefits using local currency. We understand that consumers are more likely to make efforts if they see immediate material advantages. In our app, we display consumption and savings information in local currency and also provide attractive incentives in the form of CO2 emissions reduction (measured in kilograms). Many individuals are aware of the problem but lack knowledge about how to solve it. Our solution acts as a one-stop-shop concept (awareness of the problem - problem solutions - offering products in accordance, with our partners - installing services, through our partners - financing solutions, through our partners), offering an innovative approach for beginners in this field. Our revenue streams emerge from Intermediating PV systems projects, Intermediating green loans, Intermediating green home appliances sales be charging a 5% referral commission, CSR budgets - delivery of sustainability reports for corporate clients to meet ESG requirements.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Energy, Mobile Apps, Sustainability

DigiCARE Realized
1-10
Jun 1, 2022
DigiCARE Realized is an emerging AI-technology firm commercializing evidence-based solutions to modernize care for complex brain disease through decision intelligence in early detection and care management. Our initial focus is in Alzheimer’s disease and related dementia (ADRD) where we seek to realize equitable, accessible, and patient-centered care. We collaborate with health systems to deliver routine brain care for our growing, aging population. DigiCARE Realized offers an AI-enabled platform for delivering decision intelligence to support proactive care in ADRD. Machine learning advancements, like decision intelligence, automate processing of vast data sources to deliver faster, actionable insights for providers. Our flagship product is based on a core principle that if you can measure it, you can manage it. Early detection offers the opportunity for timely diagnosis leading to more proactive care. We aim to develop and curate care management solutions. Powered by machine learning, our software provides passive ADRD detection with ~80% performance accuracy for 1- and 3-year prediction horizons. It combs through routinely-collected data found in patient health records to sort through structured and unstructured data. Our flagship product can help detect early-stage ADRD in all patients, regardless of what language they speak, how little time their provider has, or what kind of screening approach is selected that day. When health systems can detect early-stage ADRD in patients, they can give them better care. Providers can offer interventions sooner, they can prevent hospital readmissions, and they can accelerate participation in clinical trials.
Health Care
New York, New York, United States
AI-enabled platform powered by AI/ML & routinely collected electronic health record data for early detection + care in Alzheimer's disease

SendEngage Logo
SendEngage
11-50
May 2, 2022
SendEngage is an AI-driven Sales Automation Platform designed for small teams to engage a broad audience through personalized one-to-one emails. By utilizing our proven system, B2B companies can swiftly amplify lead generation, boost revenue, and reduce customer acquisition costs. With the capability to connect unlimited corporate email accounts and the advantage of our inbox rotation, customers can effortlessly scale their outreach initiatives while ensuring optimal deliverability. Our campaign sequencer offers features like A/B testing, single-thread automated follow-ups, unlimited follow-up steps, variable inserts, and the automatic exclusion of prospects once they respond. When prospects reply across multiple inboxes, we consolidate these responses in our Engagement section. Our AI analyzes email replies and categorizes them based on the level of interest. Low-value responses can be auto-discarded, and the respective contacts can be blocked from future communications. Conversely, high-value responses are automatically directed to the sales team for further action. Our system operates on a usage-based model, accommodating unlimited contact storage, inbox connections, and users.

Scrooge Frog AI Logo
Scrooge Frog AI
1-10
Jun 20, 2022
Our AI solution is a valuable instrument in the fight against fraudulent activities in the marketing sector. It is founded on advanced algorithms and technologies and is trained on extensive datasets, setting it apart from antiquated methods and algorithms commonly employed in this field. One of the primary merits of our product is its capability to uncover hidden connections, analyze multiple factors, and classify fraudulent behavior. In contrast to conventional algorithms, our system not only considers the fundamental fraud indicators but is also adept at recognizing unusual patterns that may go unnoticed by standard fraud detection methods. It is developed with the aid of a large number of parameters that we take into account in our datasets. Thanks to the utilization of advanced machine learning methods, our models possess the ability to adapt and enhance their efficiency with each new dataset. As data is automatically collected, the system becomes more accurate and effective in preventing fraudulent activities. Additionally, we provide the option to integrate our solution into existing client systems and infrastructure to ensure maximum integration and utilization efficiency. Our product facilitates real-time analysis and monitoring, enabling swift responses to potential threats and the prevention of financial losses. Throughout the development process, we have placed special emphasis on creating an intuitive interface that allows our clients to interact seamlessly with the system and receive real-time information about potential risks. Flexibility and scalability are essential features of our product. Our system ensures the confidentiality and data protection of clients and complies with all necessary security standards and regulations of the countries with which we operate. Furthermore, it is crucial to note that our product outperforms competitors' traditional algorithms in combating fraudulent activities. Unlike manual data processing and manual fraud detection, our system is based on an automated approach, significantly increasing the efficiency and accuracy of fraud detection. The key advantages include: 1. Accuracy and Precision: AI-based anti-fraud systems rely on advanced algorithms and machine learning models to analyze vast volumes of data. This enables them to identify subtle patterns and anomalies that may be indicative of fraud, leading to improved accuracy and precision in identifying fraudulent transactions or actions. 2. Real-Time Detection: AI-based anti-fraud systems can operate in real-time, allowing for immediate identification and response to fraudulent activities. This rapid response is crucial in preventing potential losses and minimizing damage. 3. Adaptability: Machine learning algorithms can adapt and learn from new data, evolving alongside changing fraud tactics. This adaptability enhances the system's effectiveness against emerging threats and strategies. 4. Recognition of Complex Patterns: AI-based anti-fraud solutions can recognize complex patterns and correlations between different data, identifying non-obvious connections that rule-based traditional systems might miss. 5. Automated Decision-Making: AI-based anti-fraud systems can automate decision-making processes, particularly valuable in high-volume industries. This results in faster processing times and reduced operational costs. 6. Continuous Learning: Machine learning models continuously refine their understanding of normal and abnormal behavioral patterns as they process new data. This ongoing learning process enhances the system's ability to adapt to evolving fraud strategies. 7. Scalability: AI algorithms and solutions can efficiently process large volumes of data and operations, making them suitable for organizations of various sizes and industries. 8. Behavior Analysis: AI can analyze historical data to create profiles of genuine user behavior. This enables the system to detect deviations from normal behavior and identify potentially fraudulent actions. In conclusion, considering the growing volume of malicious bot traffic and constantly evolving fraudulent methods, AI is an indispensable part of successful fraud prevention. Our solution provides significant value to clients, helping them avoid financial losses, safeguard their reputation, and ensure the security of their business processes.

Rentainance Logo
Rentainance
11-50
Jun 15, 2022
At Rentainance, we are in the process of developing a Prop-Tech application designed to bridge the gap between landlords, tenants, and brokers in the rental market. As existing platforms primarily focus on classified rentals, we aim to establish ourselves as an industry-first deal management platform that streamlines the entire process from initial profiling to rent payments. Utilizing our platform for deal management, we have incorporated an AI-based scoring model for tenants, known as the Rscore. This innovative scoring system assists landlords in mitigating risks while selecting tenants, and also serves as a risk and reward mechanism. A lower score results in higher rent, and vice versa, fostering transparency and accessibility in the rental market. Additionally, Rentainance is committed to addressing the issue of misleading property photos uploaded by landlords and brokers. To tackle this concern, our platform features a dedicated move-in photos section, allowing tenants to access authentic images uploaded by previous occupants. Furthermore, our platform's inbuilt deal flow manager enables brokers to effortlessly share property details and profiles, enhancing overall efficiency in the rental market. In summary, Rentainance is revolutionizing the rental industry by offering a comprehensive and transparent platform that caters to the needs of landlords, tenants, and brokers alike.

CausalWizard Logo
CausalWizard
1-10
Sep 1, 2022
CausalWizard is an online, graphical web-app software that helps you measure and understand cause-and-effect relationships in historical data. It uses Python Causal Inference statistical techniques and Machine Learning to reason about complex systems. Users can draw diagrams of expected relationships between key variables or entities and use the app to confirm or refute the strength and magnitude of the effect of one variable on another. This process also allows hypothetical, counterfactual scenarios and outcomes to be explored, providing answers to "what if?" and "why?" questions about your data.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Asset Management, CRM, Industrial Manufacturing, Machine Learning, Product Design, Product Research

We use Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to experience drinks like never before! Our team believes that in a modern world it is important to preserve the values and culture of our traditions and that is why we appreciate the importance of developing local small producers of alcoholic beverages in the United Kingdom and Europe. YEP! service, using AI technologies, allows the consumer to make an independent choice of drink based only on taste preferences. “Making a person closer to a person through the YEP! platform” - is what our company is striving for. We know that getting what our customers need and being satisfied with their choice is as quick and easy as saying YEP! They are free to choose the most suitable shopping format: in-store, fast delivery, or instant pickup. Our algorithms allow customers to provide beverages on-demand and anticipate selections for future orders. YEP!’s founders have more than 15 years of experience in building companies in different industries. Over the past few years, they have created innovative companies in the alcohol market and understand it well. Having met while studying at a business school, they decided to combine their experience and expertise in retail and building digital products to build a truly outstanding company in the European market.

Superlative Biosciences
1-10
May 9, 2022
Superlative Biosciences is a biological services and therapeutics products development company. We are involved in the following: 1) Skin Cancer Therapeutics : We are using human tissue constructs, animal cancer models, image & spectroscopic molecular analysis, and AI to discover, formulate & deliver compounds into tumors to treat human skin cancer. We are seeking a partner or investor to join with us to help move the R&D program into clinical phases of development. 2) Toxicology Screening Services: Another of our projects is the use of high-throughput in vitro biological assays in the area of developmental toxicology. Initial screens will involve the use of human umbilical cord- and placental- derived stem cells in vitro which may allow your company to decrease the use of animals and the costs incurred in developmental toxicology testing. 3) Oncology Drug Testing: We are also developing human in vitro 3-dimensional multicellular systems that mimic the tumor microenvironment that may be used in the pre-clinical phase of the development of drugs, biologics, and biosimilars. These 3-D tissue constructs, that contain multiple cell types that are found in the tumor microenvironment, therefore more closely represent the dynamic conditions that are exhibited in vivo in the tissues of human subjects than that which can be observed using 2-D tissue culture systems. 4) Please see our funding campaign at Gust.com or AngelList.com: https://gust.com/companies/superlative-biosciences-corporation/dashboard https://angel.co/company/superlative-biosciences-2 5) Superlative BioSciences Also Provides Consultation On: Biologics, Biosimilars, Pharmaceuticals, In Vitro Diagnotics, Cell & Tissue Therapy, Stem Cells, and Combination Devices Regulatory Guidance The Preparation of Quality Manuals & Other Quality Documents including Change Control, Deviations, CAPA, FMEA, Trending, and Complaint Handling, FDA/GLP, FDA/GTP, FDA/QSR, FDA/GMP, ICH, EMA, CE Marking & ISO Documents Management. Llaima
1-10
Jun 1, 2022
Overview: Llaima is revolutionizing corporate knowledge management with its innovative IQaaS (Intelligent Knowledge as a Service) platform. Our solution provides a virtual assistant that seamlessly integrates with your company’s existing communication tools like Slack and Microsoft Teams, enabling your employees to access crucial information instantly and efficiently. By leveraging advanced AI technologies, we ensure that your team spends less time searching for information and more time on productive tasks. How It Works: Our web-based platform allows you to upload your documentation or connect your existing documentation platforms such as Google Drive, Notion, or Confluence. Once the documents are uploaded, our system processes them using splitting, chunking, and embedding techniques to create a vectorized database. This database is then utilized by a large language model (LLM) to provide precise and contextually relevant answers to employee queries. The platform also includes a robust permission management system to ensure secure and controlled access to information based on user roles.

Beeplife Logo
Beeplife
1-10
Jul 2, 2022
BeepLife is a healthcare application using AI technology that promotes health and accelerates the connection between doctors and patients. It collects patients’ data, disease, and treatment history, which enables doctors to record and store a valuable database of their patient's history. In this way, doctors can pull up the information needed in a really quick time. The data collected will give insight to our physicians to distinguish non-emergency clients from emergency ones, so it can contribute largely to saving time for the doctors and nurses. Beeplife's AI services provide health information only and do not provide a diagnosis. The AI services respond to the information entered, and the information provided is based on risk factors and statistics, rather than a personalized assessment. The AI services are not a substitute for a medical professional, and should not be used in a medical emergency. It was founded in 2022 and is located in Toronto, Canada.

Mindgard Ltd specializes in providing comprehensive AI security solutions to enterprises. Our operations center around a sophisticated platform designed to determine, detect, and remediate adversarial attack vulnerabilities within AI models. The platform is built on over four years of PhD-led research in AI and cyber security, ensuring advanced protection that traditional Cyber Security platforms cannot offer. Our platform integrates seamlessly with existing AI and Cyber Security tools, enabling automated and repeatable vulnerability testing across the entire AI estate. This integration allows enterprises to efficiently assess and mitigate risks, optimizing their AI and cyber security resources. Key operational features include: - Automated Security Testing: Utilizing a library of adversarial attacks, our platform conducts thorough and repeated security tests to identify vulnerabilities. - Detection and Response: The platform continuously monitors AI models for threats and provides rapid detection and response capabilities to neutralize potential attacks. - Seamless Integration: Designed for compatibility with existing operational tools, our platform can be easily incorporated into current security infrastructures. Rosso Logo
Rosso
1-10
Jul 22, 2022
Rosso is a startup dedicated to eliminating the blood shortage crisis in Italy by serving as a connective tissue in the blood supply chain, collaborating with schools, universities, donor associations, and hospitals. Our primary goal is to reduce patient wait times by increasing the number of donors, particularly young donors. Currently, Generation Z is not donating blood significantly; the average donor age is 45, while donation is allowed from 18 to 65 years old. Through innovative social media campaigns and a booking platform, we raise awareness among young people, encouraging them to book donations at nearby centers and providing instant chat access with hematologists to address their concerns. For companies, we offer a welfare service and sustainability membership that engages employees in health prevention and blood donation. We organize awareness webinars, donation days, and monitor employee health, providing impact reports. These activities are included in the company's sustainability report and contribute to B-Corp certification. Our third pillar involves management software for hospitals. We offer a plugin that optimizes blood stock management in hospitals by managing donor portfolios and the relationships between donors, associations, and hospitals. By knowing the blood stock levels, we can send automatic recalls or alerts when blood is needed and there are donors nearby ready to donate. With the help of AI, we can predict future blood stock needs, required blood types, and the timing of potential shortages.
Health Care
Milano, Lombardia, Italy
Making Blood Donations Cool

Our platform is ideal for organizations in industries such as healthcare, finance, technology, and manufacturing, where effective training is critical for success. Leeloo LXP seamlessly integrates with existing LMS systems like Moodle to turn any learning content into immersive, personalized tutoring sessions in any language, that drive engagement, retention, and measurable results. With Leeloo's proprietary IVX technology (Interactive Video Experiences), learners engage in one-on-one video sessions with smart, responsive AI tutors. These tutors adapt to each learner's needs, providing lessons, explanations, examples, and assessments to ensure mastery of every concept. IVX sessions are automatically generated from your existing content, requiring zero modification. Our platform offers two industry-leading pedagogical approaches: Bloom's Taxonomy with 6 cognitive processes, and our own NIL-TO-IT framework which trains 12 cognitive muscles. Whichever you choose, Leeloo automatically creates all necessary assessments, saving you time and effort. Advanced analytics measure engagement, retention, academic results and hundreds of data points to deliver descriptive, predictive, diagnostic and prescriptive insights. Leeloo LXP provides real-time visibility into learner performance at every level of your organization. Track progress, identify skill gaps, and make data-driven decisions to optimize training investments. Leeloo LXP reduces costs for content production, translations, training time and infrastructure. Our skill acquisition guarantee ensures measurable ROI from every program. With Leeloo LXP, you can pinpoint areas where learners excel or struggle, adapt quickly to emerging skills gaps, and nurture high-potential talent. Boost employee motivation with personalized, interactive learning experiences that are proven to drive results. Our business model is designed for flexibility and scalability. Clients pay a one-time setup fee to integrate Leeloo LXP into their existing LMS and create customized web and mobile apps, and then choose between a pay-as-you-go per minute model or a per user per month subscription. This allows organizations to align costs with their specific needs and usage patterns.

Elythea is an ML/DL-driven platform that obstetricians in any setting use to predict risk for complications of pregnancy (postpartum hemorrhage, c-section, eclampsia) before they ever happen. We use information that is available at the point of care, so we can make the prediction as early as the 1st trimester, allowing doctors months to prepare in advance! We use clinical history/demographic information that is available at the point-of-care, so we can make the prediction as early as the 1st trimester, in developed or developing countries, allowing doctors months to prepare in advance! Knowing high-risk earlier allows for blood/medicine/tailored clinical guidance to be prepared, reducing mortality/costs >90%. Our models use proprietary models to surpass gold standard risk assessments in the current clinical space. AI content platform - Personalized generative AI for organizations. Typetone (former Schrijven.AI) helps brands and companies to implement generative AI organization wide to generate content and text. We help with AI text in the tone of voice and brand identity of your organization. Organizations today rely heavily on content for their daily operations. However, creating this content can be a costly affair, especially if it has to be done on a large scale. Fortunately, artificial intelligence (AI) now offers a solution to reduce these costs and streamline the content creation process. Nonetheless, the output of AI tools can often be generic and not match the specific style and identity of your organization or brand. Especially at scale, the use of these tools can lead to a sameness of text, and organizations (and their users) no longer recognize the brand in the text. For example, Bol.com's marketing content is very different from Coolblue's, but with tooling like ChatGPT, that distinction doesn't show up well. This is where Typetone offers a solution. Typetone is a tool that personalizes AI output to your own or a brand's writing style. With Typetone, an organization can create content efficiently and affordably, without compromising on quality and brand identity. ModernVivo Logo
ModernVivo
1-10
Oct 5, 2022
New drugs fail in human clinical trials 90% of the time. These failures can be traced directly back to the consistent inability of preclinical animal studies to predict clinical success, yet the design process for preclinical animal studies has remained largely unchanged for decades; scientists read a tiny fraction of published literature and write their experimental protocols in 2-4 weeks. This time-consuming, tedious process is not only a major pain point for in-vivo scientists but leads to substantial experimental design flaws, resulting in unreliable data with which billion-dollar decisions are made. At ModernVivo, we are revolutionizing this antiquated process by equipping scientists with tools that enable them to write in-vivo protocols more effectively. Our technology empowers scientists to streamline their work, accelerating drug development timelines.

We combine predictive breeding technologies through our AI and deep learning-based platform called NODES™. Our mission is to contribute to worldwide food security whilst fostering a more sustainable world through science and innovation, collaborating with our customers in the development of better crops and products. We develop accessible technologies tailored to each customer that have a positive impact on both their business and the environment. We work with seed companies of any size looking to improve their crop genetics in less time and at lower costs. Join us to the future of agriculture!

Health 360
11-50
Oct 12, 2022
Health 360 is a SaaS electronic health management system designed to revolutionize healthcare in Iraq by streamlining documentation processes, reducing medical errors, and improving patient outcomes. The platform leverages AI technology to convert speech-to-text, provide drug-drug interaction warnings, and offer decision support systems for healthcare providers. Accessible on web, mobile app, and cross-platform devices, Health 360 provides a comprehensive and user-friendly solution for healthcare providers and patients in Iraq. Key Features: AI-powered Speech-to-Text: Health 360 simplifies documentation processes by enabling healthcare providers to dictate patient information and convert it to text automatically, reducing the time spent on manual data entry. Drug-Drug Interaction Warnings: The platform's AI technology analyzes patient medications and provides warnings for potential drug-drug interactions, reducing the risk of adverse effects and improving patient safety. Decision Support Systems: Health 360 offers evidence-based clinical decision support tools, helping healthcare providers make informed decisions regarding patient care. Multiplatform Access: Compatible with macOS, Windows, iOS, and Android devices, Health 360 ensures that healthcare providers can access patient information from any location, increasing productivity and flexibility. Market Opportunity: Iraq's healthcare system is in need of modernization, with many healthcare providers still relying on inefficient paper-based systems. Health 360's electronic health management system offers a much-needed solution, targeting healthcare providers in Iraq seeking to improve efficiency, patient outcomes, and reduce the risk of errors. The platform's potential user base includes hospitals, clinics, and private practices, providing ample opportunity for growth. Revenue Model: Health 360 will generate revenue through a subscription-based model, offering different pricing tiers to cater to various sizes and needs of healthcare providers. Additional revenue streams may include premium features, integration with third-party services, and data analytics services for healthcare organizations. Go-to-Market Strategy: Develop strategic partnerships with healthcare organizations, government agencies, and NGOs in Iraq to promote the adoption of Health 360. Attend healthcare conferences and events to showcase the platform's capabilities and network with potential customers and partners. Implement targeted marketing campaigns, emphasizing the platform's key benefits, such as improved efficiency, patient outcomes, and reduced errors. Offer a free trial period to potential customers, allowing them to experience the benefits of Health 360 firsthand. Provide comprehensive training and support to healthcare providers during the onboarding process, ensuring a smooth transition to the platform. With Health 360, healthcare providers in Iraq can embrace the benefits of a modernized and efficient electronic health management system, improving overall patient care and outcomes .

Yevul Info
1-10
Oct 18, 2022
Growers face high operating costs and environmentally harmful chemical use while discovering plant deficiencies when they become visible, leading to inefficiencies. In response to these pain points, Yevul Info has thrived on an AI platform that's revolutionizing sustainable farming. Existing precision fertilization methods often involve excessive use (30-40% above necessity) or costly, complex technologies (sensors, drones) that only larger farms can afford and profit from after years of maintenance. OPTIMO™, Implements continuous monitoring to detect immediate changes in plant nutrition (within 4 days), enabling intervention before visible deterioration (approximately 10 days prior). This approach requires no initial investment or maintenance, ensuring immediate profitability. Data is continuously being sent to our cloud-based system. There, every detail of crop health is being analyzed, and actionable feedback is being provided to growers. With Yevul Info, expect streamlined operations, continuous monitoring for peace of mind, and proactive health deterioration interventions, all leading to an excellent ROI.

Carepay - Care fintech solution Logo
Carepay - Care fintech solution
11-50
Oct 1, 2022
The CarePay is creating a new way to pay for care that is more affordable and accessible. With CarePay, you can get the care you need when you need it without having to worry about the cost. Our Care Now Pay Later model combines membership benefits and health insurance. We offer different payment options including monthly instalments and no-interest financing. The Care Now Pay Later model is a relatively new concept in the Asian market, so there are not many direct competitors yet. However, there are a number of companies that offer similar services, such as: Atome: Atome is a Singapore-based BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in 7 countries in Southeast Asia, including Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam, the Philippines, and Hong Kong. Hoolah: Hoolah is an Australian BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in Australia, Singapore, and New Zealand. Splitit: Splitit is an Israeli BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in 40 countries, including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. Sezzle: Sezzle is an American BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online purchases. It is currently available in the United States, Canada, Australia, and the United Kingdom. Klarna: Klarna is a Swedish BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in 17 countries, including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. These companies all offer similar services to Care Now Pay Later, but they may have different features and fees. It is important to compare the different options available before choosing a BNPL provider. The Care Now Pay Later model is still a relatively new concept in the Asian market, so it is likely that more competitors will emerge in the future. This is because the BNPL market is growing rapidly in Asia, and there is a demand for more flexible payment options. We can capture a significant share of the $600M billion dollar care market in Asia. It is expected to grow at a CAGR of 5.5% from 2023 to 2030, reaching $914 billion by 2030. If you're looking for a more affordable and accessible way to pay for care, then CarePay is your solution. Visit our website https://carepay.mn/ or contact us to learn more.

Upvote Logo
Upvote
1-10
Nov 1, 2022
See our future-dated mock press release for the best understanding of Upvote. Voter-turnout at all-time-high as politicians partner with Upvote to better understand their electorate on an issue-by-issue basis. Des Moines, IA – November 5, 2024 Voter turnout among those aged 18 - 35 has reached an all-time high this election cycle, thanks largely to widespread politician partnerships with Upvote. Upvote’s verified information has taken the guesswork out of politics, freeing representatives to act in the best interest of their constituents. Since their inception, Upvote has informed and empowered voters nationwide to instigate change within their political jurisdictions by providing a trusted connection between representatives and their constituents, culminating in a renewed sense of faith in American Institutions. “Before I started using Upvote, I had completely given up on politics,” Shared Nathan P. “I felt like most politicians had a hidden agenda - that they overlooked their constituents in favor of special interests. Now I want to participate because we’re seeing that change is possible.” Upvote transforms the way voters connect with their elected officials by providing a platform that groups, verifies, educates, and empowers them. Their curated, unbiased news feed keeps voters informed and up-to-date on their top policy interests and representatives. Politician ratings give a clear picture of how officials represent important issues. Issue tracking brings plain-language to complex policy and its impact on individuals and their communities. Representative profiles make it easy to understand motivations through campaign finance contributions by special interest, personal investments, voting history by issue, and unbiased bios. Most importantly, verification provides a direct line of communication between voters and their representatives, giving weight to the voice of verified constituents. “I never felt like I actually knew who these politicians were or how their actions matched their words.” shared John H. “I would try to research, but the information was so hard to find and to understand. Now I just check Upvote. Not only do I understand what’s going on, I can see how I’m influencing these outcomes in real-time. It’s addictive.” Beyond serving constituents, Upvote provides a critical service for politicians and their back-office staff. Through their constituent verification mechanism, Upvote has re-architected the public forum to cut through the inherent noise of traditional social media platforms. Officials now know that they’re communicating with real, verified voters in their jurisdiction. They are given a platform to explain their actions and beliefs directly to those that they represent. They are also equipped with granular, proprietary data regarding verified constituent sentiment across all key policy areas. This deep, informed connection allows them to better serve their constituents, and has allowed them to build a reputation through effective service instead of fundraising. “My top priority has always been to effectively serve my constituents, but there was no way for me to stay deeply connected with them at scale.” shared Congressman Brad T. “Aside from town halls and door knocking, it was difficult for me to gather the data-points I needed to serve them on every issue. Now, I check Upvote before every vote on the house floor. My constituents even help me draft language in the bills I bring to subcommittees. The best part is that I’ve gotten so much recognition for my service through Upvote that I don’t need to fundraise nearly as much. I can just focus on serving my community.” Through their platform, Upvote has proven that it is possible to disrupt traditional lobbying and campaign finance, placing democracy’s outcomes back in the hands of the voter.
Software
Des Moines, Iowa, United States
The AI-Enabled SaaS Platform that is Optimizing Democracy
160,644
50321
www.goupvote.com
Midwestern US
—
—
—
kasey@goupvote.com

WPAI Inc Logo
WPAI Inc
1-10
Nov 1, 2022
WPAI Inc is an AI startup that builds AI tools for WordPress creators, with 2 products: CodeWP and AgentWP (now alpha testing). CodeWP is an AI-powered platform designed specifically for WordPress developers and site builders. It leverages advanced artificial intelligence models trained on the latest WordPress code, functions, and best practices to provide intelligent code generation, troubleshooting, and other development tools.The user-friendly tool is trained on millions of lines of WordPress code, with plugin-specific modes refined using code directly from plugin code bases. The tool can be used to create anything from simple code snippets to multi-file functionality plugins. Originally launched in November 2022, the platform was completely rebuilt and relaunched in October 2023, with additional features like conversational editing, a dedicated chat UI, and the incorporation of more powerful models like WPGPT-PHP. AgentWP, launching in Summer 2024, is an AI-powered virtual assistant designed specifically for WordPress websites. It acts as an intelligent agent that can handle any task related to building, modifying, maintaining, securing, and generating content for your WordPress site.

ColentAI Logo
ColentAI
1-10
Dec 22, 2022
ColentAI is an innovative HR technology startup revolutionizing the way professional achievements and skills are recognized, managed, and utilized in the modern workforce. At its core, ColentAI aims to address the global skills gap that poses a significant challenge to efficient talent management and recruitment processes. This gap is primarily a result of the job market's rapid evolution, which traditional recruitment models and tools struggle to keep up with, leading to inefficiencies and missed opportunities. The flagship product of ColentAI, the "Colent Passport," is a digital platform designed as a comprehensive and dynamic ledger of professional skills. Unlike traditional resumes, which offer a static and often incomplete picture of a candidate's abilities and experiences, the Colent Passport provides a living, verified profile that evolves with each user's career journey. It integrates data from various sources, including project contributions, skill assessments, peer endorsements, and real-time work performance, to create a more accurate and holistic view of an individual's professional capabilities. ColentAI's mission is to facilitate a more efficient and effective connection between job seekers and employers. By leveraging advanced AI algorithms and a user-friendly interface, the platform ensures that companies can identify and recruit talent that precisely matches their needs, reducing the time and cost associated with hiring processes. For professionals, the Colent Passport offers a powerful tool to showcase their skills and achievements in a way that is verifiable and relevant to potential employers, thus enhancing their visibility and employability in a competitive job market. Founded by experts in recruitment and technology, ColentAI is poised to transform the recruitment landscape. Through its innovative approach and commitment to bridging the skills gap, ColentAI is not just a product but a movement towards creating a more efficient, inclusive, and future-ready global workforce.

International Centre for Trade Transparency Logo
International Centre for Trade Transparency
11-50
Nov 2022
The International Centre for Trade Transparency Limited (ICTTM) stands at the forefront of fostering transparency and adherence to compliance within the realm of international trade. The organisation is deeply engaged in the creation and deployment of innovative AI-driven tools, meticulously designed to analyze and navigate global supply chains. The ICTTMs sophisticated technology is instrumental in pinpointing various risk factors within supply chains. These include potential areas of fraud, diversions in the supply chain, payment and supplier risks, sanctions liabilities, threats linked to environmental catastrophes, and violations of human rights. Furthermore, ICTTM's tools extend beyond risk management. They are crafted to map the complex landscape of supply chains, assist companies in discovering untapped markets, predict trends in market growth and stability, and ascertain the specific requirements needed for products to penetrate diverse markets around the world. Through their unwavering commitment to technological advancement and innovation, ICTTM is not only responding to the current demands of global trade but actively shaping its future, ensuring a more transparent, secure, and efficient international trade ecosystem.

Oct 2022
Tolka AI Therapeutics makes personalized, scalable, side-effect-free phage therapy against deadly bacterial infections; powered by AI. The world is rapidly running out of antibiotics; we have only discovered one new class of antibiotics since 1987. Superbugs kill 1.3M people per year and could kill more people than cancer, costing >$330B yearly by 2050. Phages, viruses that hunt and kill bacteria, will be the antibiotics of the 21st century, but they need to be personalized. Our platform has found more and better phages for M. abscessus, a rare, hard-to-treat pathogen, than competitors. We got FDA approval to test in a human within 12 months of starting the lab.

ShadowNurse is an AI, ML, and NLP powered mHealth company that builds and leverages novel healthcare navigation technology to drive and scale operational efficiencies and gather, organize, and analyze healthcare's untapped big data sets to generate previously unrecognized insights that improve health outcomes, cut healthcare costs, improve patient quality of life, and reduce hospital re-admissions, as well as emergency, urgent care, and all other outpatient clinic visits. In doing so, ShadowNurse ensures that people everywhere and their loved ones get the best healthcare possible. ShadowNurse is actively evaluating data sharing and direct service partnerships with the following entities: Clinical Trial Sponsors, Value-Based Care Stakeholders, Payers, Self Insured Employers, Accountable Care Organizations (ACO), Hospital Systems, Government Healthcare Divisions (Federal and State), and more. ShadowNurse was born out of a powerful belief that every person deserves an unwavering advocate throughout their medical journey and that pairing the world's most trusted health professionals (nurses) with artificial intelligence creates a powerful and highly scaleable model that will fundamentally change healthcare navigation delivery. ShadowNurse's technology powers dedicated healthcare navigation and support services that provide personalized assistance to help patients of all ages and their families manage appointments, prescriptions, and other healthcare tasks--whether in the midst of a health crisis (such as a new stroke, heart attack, cancer diagnosis, or injury) or during calmer times when the focus is on staying healthy. ShadowNurse excels at supporting seniors, especially when their loved ones can't be present for medical visits and hospitalizations. Visit www.ShadowNurse.com to learn about our affordable services (roughly 10X more affordable than traditional healthcare navigation services). For patients and families ShadowNurse can: - Immediately relieve burden & stress from patients, family members, & caregivers - Eliminate information loss & confusion, ensuring that you have all the information needed to make informed decisions - Identify & prevent medical errors - Ensure seamless communication between patients, families, providers, & retirement communities - Review medications & treatment plans - Coordinate follow up appointments & logistics - Decrease number & frequency of medical visits - Ensure all paperwork is up to date (Eg. POLST forms, advance directives, & more) - Oversee pain management & improve quality of life

Altheia Inc Logo
Altheia Inc
1-10
Dec 22, 2022
The company / mission: Altheia is a health technology company specializing in unlocking data to truly put the patient first - in a way that prioritizes health equity and literacy in a scalable and affordable way. Introducing the Offering: The U.S. is a leader in technological advancements, but patient quality, outcomes and experience lag other countries, with the main reasons being data fragmentation, the amount of unstructured data in the system, and data ownership issues preventing data sharing. Complete patient health records has been the north star for many years, but technology and unclear economics have been blockers. Our offering is Acuvia, which leverages technological advancements to tackle this noble cause. First, we use AI enabled ingestion engines to read and store unstructured data, and combine it with structured for a complete patient view. Second, all data is patient consented – eliminating battles over data ownership and downstream uses of data. Our first focus area / use case for using the complete patient health record is Care Management. We layer on AI models and analytics to predict disease and prioritize outreach, while simultaneously engaging the patient in their own health and data uses. Because the collected data is patient owned, we are able to offer in-app incentives and shared data monetization plays (for example, in Life Sciences).
Health Care, Information Technology, Predictive Analytics, Wellness
Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States
Altheia is a health technology company specializing in unlocking and humanizing data to truly put the patient first.

Deep Design Systems S. L. Logo
Deep Design Systems S. L.
1-10
Oct 27, 2022
With the increasing democratization of generative AI tools, there is a huge concern about their potential impact on the environment. As more and more people gain access to them, the risk of excessive and unsustainable consumption increases. If we project this access into the future and its eventual transition to a three-dimensional domain, and subsequent on-demand manufacturing, all indications are that most objects will be synthetically generated in minutes by the end of this decade. This is the perfect scenario for increasing production to unprecedented levels, but what it could lead to, however, is a significant increase in waste and an unsustainable increase in demand for energy and raw materials. The question here is whether we will really want this as an advanced society. At Deep Design Systems we are researching and developing software based on different AI techniques with the mission to regulate, raise awareness and promote the responsible use of intelligent generative tools by redefining the industrial design process. We focus on optimizing the responsible production of objects, through applied AI research and the development of new creative protocols, with the ultimate goal of supporting a friendly transition towards a future in balance with the environment.

NOOZ.AI Logo
NOOZ.AI
11-50
Oct 1, 2022
NOOZ.AI provides the following: ARTICLE ANALYSIS: Get visual insight into media bias via labels for opinion, sentiment, propaganda, revisions, and ghost edits on each news listing. OPINION ANALYSIS: Discover how much a journalist expresses personal feelings, views, or judgments regarding the story’s topic. Opinion scores are grouped into 5 opinion labels: Neutral, Slight, Partial, High, and Extreme. SENTIMENT ANALYSIS: Gauge the journalist’s positivity (sympathy & support) or negativity (antagonism & opposition) concerning the story’s topic. Sentiment scores are grouped into 5 sentiment labels: Very Negative, Negative, Neutral, Positive, and Very Positive. PROPAGANDA ANALYSIS: Detect potential disinformation by identifying the usage of up to 18 possible persuasion techniques. Some of the more common types of propaganda found are “Flag Waving”, “Name Calling, Labeling”, “Exaggeration, Minimization”, “Appeal to Fear & Prejudice”, and “Loaded Language”, just to name a few. REVISION ANALYSIS: Investigate the evolution of a news story and the writer’s manipulation of opinion, sentiment, and propaganda over time. Our analytics reveal all the changes in each published revision of a specific news article and identifies “ghost edits” that occur when the publisher does not update the published date after making a change.
Information Technology, Software
Fort Lauderdale, Florida, United States

At its core, inkey.ai is an innovative solution that empowers students, educators, and professionals by providing sophisticated AI-driven tools. Essay Writing Made Easy Inkey.ai offers an AI Essay Writer tool that simplifies the writing process for students grappling with essay assignments. This tool helps generate coherent, structured, and well-researched essays on various topics, making writing more accessible and less time-consuming. Mastering Math with AI The AI Word Problem Solver is another hallmark of inkey.ai, explicitly designed to aid students in understanding and solving complex math word problems. This tool provides the solutions and explains the step-by-step process, enhancing learning and comprehension. Professional Writing Assistance inkey.ai extends its capabilities to professional writing as well. Whether crafting emails, checking grammar, or ensuring the clarity of communication, the platform's tools are tailored to improve the quality and efficiency of professional writing. Ensuring Originality with Plagiarism Checker The Plagiarism Checker tool is a must-have for students and writers. It ensures the originality of their work by comprehensively scanning the content to detect any similarities or potential plagiarism, guaranteeing the authenticity of the submitted work. Advanced Paraphrasing Tool For those looking to rephrase content without losing the essence, inkey.ai's Paraphrasing Tool is the perfect solution. SherlockAds is an all-in-one advertising intelligence platform that helps advertisers find and analyze ads across different social and digital platforms. The company was founded by Franklin Nwangene. With SherlockAds you can spy on your competitor's ad across 9+ social and digital advertising platforms. SherlockAds has a database of over 1 billion+ ads and supports more than 4,000 technologies, making it one of the most comprehensive ad libraries available to find ads to remodel. With SherlockAds, advertisers can search for ads based on a variety of parameters such as: > Domain, > Keyword, > Landing page text, > Social comments, > Company/brand/advertiser, and more. You can also sort ads based on their popularity, demographics, geographic location, social engagement data, call-to-action, and even see when the ad started running and how long it has been running for. One of the standout features of SherlockAds is its AI Ad Template Library, which allows advertisers to generate ads using OpenAI's API. Also, you can save your favorite ads for reference and future use, making it a valuable resource for copywriters and marketers. Another noteworthy feature is the ability to see the post or ad link live on Facebook, Pinterest, or Reddit and engage with the post/ad, making sentiment analysis a breeze. This feature allows advertisers and copywriters to understand what people are saying about their brand, competitors, or product in real-time. In conclusion, SherlockAds is an essential tool for advertisers looking to find proven ads that would convert and make informed decisions about their advertising and marketing strategies. By leveraging the ad library, competitor insights, and advanced filters, advertisers can gain a comprehensive understanding of their competitors advertising strategy and leverage these information to create ads that convert. >> For any questions or support regarding the software, please reach out to support@sherlockads.com. >> To learn more about SherlockAds, visit https://sherlockads.com.
