With the rapid advancements in technology and the changing landscape of education, traditional learning methods are becoming outdated and ineffective. That's where BasEd comes in. We believe that learning should be engaging, personalized, and accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or location. Our educational platform is designed to cater to the needs of modern learners who are constantly on the go and have limited time to dedicate to learning. By breaking down complex topics into bite-sized, easily digestible lessons, we make learning more manageable and enjoyable. Our microlearning approach ensures that learners can fit learning into their busy schedules, whether it's during their commute, lunch break, or before bed. But we don't stop at just delivering content. Our platform incorporates gamification elements to make learning a fun and interactive experience. Learners can earn points, badges, and rewards as they progress through their learning journey, providing them with a sense of achievement and motivation to continue learning. We believe that by gamifying the learning process, we can make it more engaging and increase knowledge retention. Artificial intelligence is at the core of our platform, enabling us to provide personalized learning experiences. Our AI algorithms analyze learners' performance, preferences, and goals to deliver tailored content and recommendations. This personalized approach ensures that learners receive the most relevant and effective learning materials, maximizing their learning outcomes. At BasEd, we understand the importance of collaboration and social learning. Growthware™ eliminates the noise that point solutions are rapidly introducing to local businesses. Growthware™ is here to revolutionize the way businesses grow for both our partners and their small businesses. Growthware™ does this by collecting data on the parameters and inputs of every business and using AI to correlate them with the actions businesses in similar segments have used to grow their revenues. This is collected in a proprietary database and algorithm called the Growth Index™ and delivered to our users via Growthbooks™ which automates and gamifies the progression of growth. As a partner-first company, Growthware takes enormous pride in its partnerships and works hard to improve and iterate on our partner portal and partner enablement materials. Basic Overview of GetLabTest.com GetLabTest.com is an innovative healthcare platform that significantly advances the field of medical diagnostics through the integration of artificial intelligence and data analytics. Founded on the principles of enhancing accuracy, efficiency, and accessibility in laboratory testing, GetLabTest.com leverages a sophisticated hybrid AI system developed in partnership with global technology leaders including Microsoft, Amazon, and Google. Core Offerings: AI-Driven Diagnostics: Utilizing cutting-edge algorithms, GetLabTest.com processes and analyzes vast amounts of medical data, including laboratory results, diagnoses, medications and treatment options. This allows for precision diagnostics and personalized treatment plans, greatly improving patient outcomes. Comprehensive Data Analysis: Each day, our platform analyzes 10,000 test results, with a historical database encompassing nearly 10 million actual patient cases. This extensive data pool underpins our analytics capabilities, providing deep insights and predictive outcomes in medical diagnostics. Our systems currently serve 800,000 unique users per month and are actively supporting 87 medical laboratories across the UK and the EU. With infrastructure supporting 260 physical locations within the UK and 700 in Poland, GetLabTest.com is poised for expansion into the US and Japan, showcasing our platform's scalability and the robustness of our operational framework. Innovative Diagnostic Solutions: GEtLabTest offers proprietary screening packages and an AI-supported diagnosis system that significantly reduces analysis time by over 90%, enhancing efficiency for healthcare providers Enhanced Patient Care: The platform serves healthcare professionals and individual patients by offering tools that not only facilitate comprehensive health assessments but also support doctors in making informed decisions. Our goal is to make diagnostic services more proactive and preventive, rather than merely reactive. API for Seamless Integration: GetLabTest’s robust API facilitates quick and efficient integration with existing medical laboratory infrastructure and systems, allowing for easy adoption and scalability. Zero Initial Investment with Additional Revenue Streams: Partnering with GetLabTest requires no initial investment from Partners yet opens up additional revenue streams through our established and expanding market presence. Leveraging Existing Infrastructure: Utilizing Partner’s network of patient service centers, ventures, and our mobile phlebotomy capabilities we can quickly scale our service offerings in the US market, reducing the need for new infrastructure investments. We provide services in all major cities in the UK and Poland with in-house blood and other sample collection services. Experienced Specialist Team: GetLabTest’s team comprises top specialists with extensive experience in the healthcare industry and in leading laboratories such as Synlab, Unilab, and London Medical Laboratory, Amcare Labs International/Johns Hopkins Medicine International, Stanford Health Care, ensuring that our operations maintain the highest standards of excellence. Global Expansion Plans: With proven success in the UK and EU, GetLabTest.com is strategically expanding its services to new markets, aiming to transform healthcare diagnostics in the US. Vision and Mission: Our vision is to revolutionize the way healthcare is delivered by harnessing the power of AI to make diagnostic services faster, more accurate, and universally accessible. Our mission is to empower healthcare providers and patients with advanced tools for early diagnosis and efficient treatment, ultimately leading to better health outcomes and reduced healthcare costs. Future Directions: GetLabTest.com is continuously evolving, driven by innovation and the commitment to excellence. Our ongoing research and development efforts focus on further enhancing AI capabilities and exploring new opportunities for integration and collaboration with international healthcare providers and laboratories.

LETT DO Logo
LETT DO
11-50
Nov 2022
LETT DO facilitates connections between local service providers and individuals in Israel. Service specialists can easily list their offerings across various categories without contractual obligations. The platform, available on web and mobile with iOS and Android apps soon to launch, incorporates modern features like a recommendation system, advanced search, and automatic translation of ads. It enables direct communication with professionals and seamless order placement, ensuring an intuitive user experience. Additionally, LETT DO provides tailored programs for professionals, such as personalized ads and marketing initiatives, as well as payment and invoicing services under special terms through partners. Committed to transforming the Israeli service sector, LETT DO leverages AI to introduce innovative features like booking systems, payment solutions, and analytics tools. With comprehensive support in technological, financial, legal, and marketing aspects, LETT DO aims to streamline personal service management into a single, user-friendly product.

Jack AI helps marketers write marketing material for different websites such as Instagram, Facebook, Linkedin, Google. Jack AI also helps marketers write blogs that are optimised for SEO. Jack AI has other tools for business such as Email Marketing, Website Copywriting and Google Ads. Jack AI has over 50 tools to choose from so that you don't need any other tool when doing your marketing. Jack AI has a Chrome extension that enables users to use the power of Jack AI when they need it most. For example, when a marketer is on Linkedin and needs to write a post, they can pull up the JackAI Chrome extension to come up with ideas or reword an existing post.
